His sales have increased steadily and, in turn, his income.  He also operates a poultry business, another source of income for him.

He applied to an Edpyme Alternativa partner, Capital Semilla, for a 1000 new soles loan.  He will use part of the loan to buy more fruits and vegetables to stock his market business, something he needs to meet demand from his customers.  He will use another part of the loan to buy feed for his poultry business.  He will use the extra income from the investments to repay the loan and cover household expenses.  Victor is an ambitious man and one of his goals is to open another market stall so that he can go on improving his standard of living.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for his fruit and vegetable business.

loans.name: Yelba Merari

texts.es: Yelba Merari tiene 26 años, su actividad es la venta de calzado. Hace más de 4 años que tiene este negocio. Es una mujer muy emprendedora y disfruta de este medio de vida. Ha salido adelante  con el gran esfuerzo de trabajo a pesar de ser una actividad muy humilde ha logrado obtener lo necesario. El motivo del financiamiento es para la compra de  zapatillas, zapatos deportivos, sandalias, chinelas para baños, calzado para niños entre otros. Espera en un futuro llegar en transformar su pequeño local en una gran tienda.
texts.en:
Yelba Merari is 26 years old and earns her living by selling shoes. She has been in this business for more than four years. Yelba is an enterprising woman who enjoys her work. She has been able to get ahead by working hard. Even though this is a modest business, Yelba has been able to earn what she needs.

This loan will be used to buy slippers, sports shoes, sandals, flip-flops, children’s shoes, and other items. In the future, she hopes to transform her small shop into a large store.

loans.use: to buy slippers, sports shoes, sandals, flip-flops, children’s shoes, and other items.

loans.name: Humberto

texts.es: Humberto, de 19 años, es un hombre soltero y trabajador, que vive en compañía de su tío Armando, de 47 años, con quien vive en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la ciudad de La Merced. El trabajo al que se dedica, Humberto, es la venta de electrodomésticos, y demás equipos tecnológicos en una reconocida empresa del país, ya tiene un año trabajando en está empresa, y según menciona está orgulloso de poder poner en práctica sus técnicas de venta. Ya que según menciona, desde adolescente más o menos, hace 6 años, comenzó a dedicarse a la siembra de café y plátanos; los cuales heredó de su abuela Dora, de 72 años de edad; que le ayuda en la supervisión de sus sembríos, ya que él no para siempre. Pero todos los fines de semana, cultiva y abona sus 3 hectáreas de terrenos agrícolas que producen en su mayoría café, los que gracias a su capacidad de negociación, vende en un cooperativa muy reconocida de exportación. Él pertenece al banco comunal “La unión hace la fuerza del palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde está seguro de lograr sus objetivos con la ayuda de su banco comunal y de todos ustedes. Razón por la que se compromete en pagar de manera puntual sus cuotas. Humberto de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales los cuales esparcirá en sus cultivos de café, y si el dinero le alcanza invertirá en la contrata de peones para que le ayude en su mantenimiento de sus cultivos.
texts.en:
Humberto is 19 years old and he is a single and hardworking man. He lives together with his uncle Armando, 47 years old. Theirs is a rental house and it is located in the city of La Merced. Humberto's business is the sale of household appliances and electronics of a nationally-known brand name. He has been working in this field for one year and according to his comments he is proud to have been able to put in practice his sales techniques. When he was an adolescent, more or less 6 years ago, he started out planting coffee and bananas as an inheritance by his 72-year old grandmother Dora. She helps him manage the plantations to give him a break. But on the weekends he cultivates and fertilizes his 3 hectares of agricultural land that primarily produce coffee. It is thanks to his negotiation skills that he is able to see to a very well known exportation cooperative.

He is a member of the communal bank "La Union Hace la Fuerza del Palomar", meaning "Unity is the Strength of Palomar" and it is his second loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner) He is sure to meet his objects with the help of his communal bank and with the help of all of you. He is committed to making his loan payments on time. Humberto, on receiving your support, will invest the funds he requested in the purchase of several sacks of natural fertilizers which he will use in his coffee plantations. If he has some money left over he will hire farmhands to help him maintain his cultivations.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizers and to hire farmhands.

loans.name: Felix

texts.es:
Felix de 29 años de edad, vive con su esposa e hijos en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio sólo luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca que pertenece al departamento de Cajamarca.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y turismo.

Felix se dedica a la agricultura, tiene sus propias tierras de cultivo donde siembra maíz y cafe, actividad que realiza desde hace varios, además de ser productos muy consumido por las personas, una vez que realiza su cosecha lo comercializa en los diferentes mercados de la zona y fuera de ella,  con los ingresos que adquiera puede brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos y esposa.

A observar que su negocio va creciendo y a creído necesario solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para la compra de abono para mejorar su cosecha de maíz y  de café, con las ganancias que obtenga podrá pagar su crédito y solventar las necesidades diarias de su familia.  Felix con trabajo y dedicación les brinda lo mejor a sus hijos y con la intensión de brindarles otras oportunidades académicas en un futuro cercano.
texts.en:
Felix is 29 years old and lives in his own home with his wife and children. The only service he receives is electricity. Felix resides in the rural section of the District of Pomahuaca, which is part of the Department of Cajamarca. This area is known for its businesses in the agriculture, livestock, and tourism sectors.

Felix is a farmer and has his own land on which he grows corn and coffee. He has been in this business for several years. His products are widely consumed by the locals. As soon as his crops are harvested, he sells them at different markets within and outside of the area. With the income he generates, Felix is able to provide a better quality of life for his wife and children.

Seeing the need for his business to grow, Felix requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 3000 PEN. The funds will be used to buy compost so that he can improve his corn and coffee crops. The revenue he earns will be used to repay the loan and provide for the daily needs of his family. Through work and dedication, Felix will be able to provide the best for his children and give them the opportunity to pursue an education in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase compost for his corn and coffee crops.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, 46 años, casada con Herminio. Ambos tienen 4 hijos, pero solo viven con una de ellas Merly, de 15 años. En unión familiar, los tres viven en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Unión Palomar (selva central peruana). La hermosa sonrisa de Carmen, muestra la vitalidad que posee, pues cuenta que hace 9 años se dedica a la agricultura; donde sus principales sembríos constan de café, plátanos, y palta. Lo que más le gusta a ella, es poder sacar el quillo (tipo de maleza que crece entre los cultivos) que crece constantemente, pues así asegura que sus cultivos crecerán sin mayores inconvenientes. El trabajo esforzado que diariamente proporciona a sus cultivos principalmente de plátanos, hace que 2 veces al mes viaje a las ciudades de La Merced y Villa Rica, donde vende sus frutos. Pero como sabe que las épocas de cosecha de café son una vez al año, ella desea mejorar e incrementar la siembra de diferentes frutas, así está segura que no tendrá inconvenientes en su economía. Por ahora se prepara para la raspa de café (recolección de los últimos granos maduros), donde espera obtener buenas ganancias. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “La unión hace la fuerza del palomar” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de la colaboración de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de comprometerse en cumplir de manera puntual con sus cuotas. Carmen de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en transplantar sus viveros de café a los terrenos productivos; para ello necesitará varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales y peones que le ayuden en el proceso.
texts.en:
Carmen is 46 years old and she is married with Herminio. They have 4 children together but only one of their daughters, Merly who is 15 years old, lives with them. In family unity, the three of them live in a house which is their own property and it is located in the locality of Union Palomar (central Peruvian jungle). Carmen's beautiful smile speaks to her vitality. She has been involved in agriculture for 9 years and her primary plantation is coffee, bananas, and avocadoes.

What she most enjoys is being able to get rid of invasive weeds (types of plants that grow within the cultivation) which grow constantly. This is how she ensure that her cultivations will grow without major obstacles. The daily effort she invests in her cultivations, especially bananas, allows her to make 2 trips per month to the cities of La Merced and Villa Rica to sell her products. But she knows that the coffee harvest season is only once per year and she wants to improve and expand the plantation of different fruits to ensure that she will not face any financial inconveniences. For the time being she is getting ready to glean the coffee (a collection of the last ripe grains) from where she hopes to obtain good earnings. She is a member of the communal bank "La Union Hace la Fuerza del Palomar", meaning "Unity is the Strength of Palomar" and it is her second loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She hopes to have the support from all of you to be able to move forward with her objectives. She is committed to making her loan payments on time. Carmen, on receiving your support, will invest the funds she requests in the transplantation of her coffee plants into productive farmland. For this she will need several sacks of natural fertilizers and farmhands to help with the process.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and to hire farmhands.

loans.name: Delfina

texts.es: Delfina, de 30 años, vive en su casa propia, en compañía de su esposo Emilio y de su pequeño hijo, juntos habitan en el caserío de Cumutay. Desde muy joven se dedica a la agricultura, y en la actualidad  siembra alverja junto a su pareja; aunque dice que la labor es algo sacrificada, pues debe madrugar todos los días para vigilar con dedicación sus cultivos. Pero le alienta saber que, la recompensa a todo su esfuerzo es la buena cosecha que obtiene cuando su producción de alverja esta lista para ser recogida. Es ahí que contrata la ayuda de operarios (trabajadores) que le ayudan a alistar  los pesados sacos para comercializarlos a los vendedores mayoristas de la ciudad. Las ganancias que obtiene de la venta de sus productos naturales son regulares, es por esta razón que puede ofrecer a su familia una buena calidad de vida. Como la labor agrícola le parece un negocio rentable, para más adelante tiene planeado sembrar en mayor cantidad para mejorar sus ganancias, además quiere comprar ganado porcino y empezar con la comercialización de estos animales. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde promete ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas, además esta muy agradecida con las personas que hicieron posible el crédito que le permitirá continuar trabajando. Defina piensa sembrar alverja en sus terrenos agrícolas; por ello de obtener su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para comenzar con éxito su proyecto agrícola.
texts.en:
Delfina is 30 years old and she lives in a house which is her own property. She lives together with her husband Emilio and their young son in the community of Cumutay. Since she was very young she has been involved in agriculture and currently she plants peas together with her partner. She says that the work is somewhat difficult especially because her days have to start very early in the morning to be able to diligently oversee the cultivation. But she gains strength in known that the reward for all of her effort is a good harvest, which is obtained when the products are ready to be collected. At that time she hires farmhands (workers) to help her get the heavy sacks ready for sale to the wholesalers in the city. The earnings which she will obtain from the sale of her natural products are steady and it is the reason why she is able to offer her family a good quality of life. She feels that agricultural work is a profitable business so in the future she plans on increasing her plantation to improve her earnings. She also wants to buy pigs to start a livestock business. 

She is a member of the communal bank "Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay", meaning "A Beautiful Dawn in Cumutay" and it is her ninth loan with MFP (Kiva Field Partner). She is committed to making her loan payments on time. She is also very thankful to those individuals who made this loan possible because it will help her to continue her work. Delfina plans on planting peas on her farmland and she needs your support for this to happen. She will invest the funds she requested in the purchase of natural fertilizers to have a successful start her agricultural project.

loans.use: to purchase natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Teodulo

texts.es:
Teodulo es un padre de familia de 49 años de edad, vive con sus hijos en su casa propia, no cuenta con servicios básicos, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito de La Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Esta zona desarrolla la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesanía.

Teodulo desde hace 5 años se dedica a la comercialización de plátanos al por mayor y menor en los diferentes mercados de la zona, es conocido por los comerciantes y el producto que ofrece, con la venta de la fruta podrá solventar sus obligaciones familiares.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 2000 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de plátanos para seguir vendiéndolo a sus clientes y con sus ingresos podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar el nivel de vida de su familia.  Teodulo es un padre de familia responsable y trabajador que lo único que quiere es que sus hijos tengan un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Teodulo is the father of a family, 49 year old, and he lives with his children in a house which is his own property. It is not equipped with the basic services and it is located in the rural region of the district of La Matanza, belonging to the department of Piura. This region is known for its agricultural, farming, and artisan works.

Teodulo has been selling bananas in wholesale and in retail to the different markets in the region for the past 5 years. He is known by the merchants for the products that he offers. With the sale of fruits he is able to meet his family's obligations.

He has requested from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) a loan in the amount of 2000 nuevos soles to purchase a larger quantity of bananas to resell to his clients. With the profits he will be able to repay his loan and he will improve the quality of life for his family. Teodulo is a responsible family man. He is a hardworking man and the only thing that he wants is for his children to have a better future.

loans.use: to purchase bananas in larger quantities for resale.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials so that he can build rooms for his children.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.es: Nilda, de 31 años; convive desde hace 10 años con Javier, su esposo. Ambos tienen 3 hijos, a los que quieren y cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Hace un año, comenzó a afrontar sola las decisiones económicas del hogar. Ya que junto a su esposo, desde hace 9 años, comenzaron a sembrar en sus terrenos agrícolas arrendados: alverja, lechuga y papa. La ayuda que le brindaba era primordial e importante, pero “hace un año”, comenzó a trabajar en una empresa privada, que se encarga de la creación de una hidroeléctrica en la zona. Es así que Nilda, comenzó a dedicar toda su fuerza a mantener sus cultivos y a sembrar como de costumbre durante el año. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo son las épocas de cosecha, ya que ve concretizado todo su esfuerzo en la venta de sus alimentos al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Tarma. Ahora desea mejorar la calidad de su siembra y así obtener el capital necesario para abrir una tienda de comestibles en su localidad. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es el segundo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración para lograr sus objetivos. Además de comprometerse en pagar puntualmente sus cuotas. Nilda de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de alverja para comenzar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Nilda is 31 years old and she has been living with her husband Javier for the past 10 years. They have 3 children together and they enjoy a house which is their own property. It is located in the community of Cumutay. Since last year she has been making the household's financial decisions alone. Nine years ago, she and her husband started out planting peas, lettuce, and potatoes in agricultural land with they rented. The help that this business provided them was primordial and important. Last she worked at a private company which is in charge of producing a hydroelectric dam in the region. Nilda now dedicates all of her strength in maintaining her cultivations and to plant as she always did during the year. What she most enjoys about her work is the harvest season because this is when she is able to see all of her efforts materialized and she is able to sell the food products in the wholesalers market in the city of Tarma. Currently she wants to improve the quality of her plantation to be able to earn the necessary capital funds to start up a grocery store in her locality. 

She is a member of the communal bank "Linda Amanecer de Cumutay", meaning "A Beautiful Dawn in Cumutay". It is her second loan through MFP (Kiva Field Partner) and she hopes to have your support in helping her reach her objectives. She is committed to making her loan payments on time. Nilda, on receiving your support, will invest the funds she requested in the purchase of a sack of pea seeds to successful start up her next plantation.

loans.use: to purchase a sack of pea seeds.

loans.name: Olga Dariela

texts.es:
Olga es una madre D. familia D. 31 años D. edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, la cual cuenta con servicio sólo D. luz, ubicado en la zona urbana del departamento D. Lambayeque. Zona que se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola, ganadera y artesana.

Olga se dedica desD. hace 2 años a la crianza y comercialización D. ganado porcino (cerdos), su corral los tiene en la parte posterior D. su casa, los alimenta con comida balanceada y granos naturales, una vez que lleguen a su crecimiento óptimo lo puedan ofrecer a sus clientes y con los ingresos que obtenga pueD. solventar los gastos D. su hogar.

Ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales y arreglar su corral que tiene, una vez que se engorden los venD. a los diferentes mercados D. su zona, con la finalidad D. que obtenga un mejor precio por ellos y así pueda tener más ingresos para mejorar su calidad D. vida.  Olga es una persona trabajadora y muy responsable que lo único que quiere es que su familia salga adelante; logrando sus objetivos.
texts.en:
Olga is a 31-year old mother of a family. She lives with her family in a house which is her own. It is only equipped with electricity and it is located in the urban region of the department of Lambayeque. The region is known for its agricultural, farming, and artisan activities.

Olga has been raising and selling pork livestock (pigs) for the past 2 years. The corrals are situated in the rear portion of her property. She feeds her livestock balanced feed and natural grains. Once they have attained an optimum growth she is able to offer them for sale to her clients. With the income that she earns she is able to proviD. for the household expenses.

She has requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles to purchase balanced feed for his livestock and to repair her corral. Once the livestock are fattened she sells them in the different markets in the region. Her goal is to obtain a better price for them in order to increase her income to improve her quality of life. Olga is a hardworking and very responsible person. The only thing that she wants is for her family to move forward by achieving her objectives.

loans.use: to purchase balanced livestock feed and to repair the corral.

loans.name: Amalia Felicita

texts.es: Amalia Felicita tiene 56 años, su actividad es la venta de frutas y verduras. Hace más de 11 años que tiene este negocio a pesar de ser un trabajo agotador ha sabido realizarlo muy bien y se encuentra satisfecha por ofrecerle a su familia el alimento diario. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de bananos, naranjas, melones, mangos, sandias y otros productos. La ubicación de su negocio es en las afueras del mercado de la terminal en donde diariamente circulan más de veinte clientes a los que ella se encarga de ofrecerle un buen servicio.
texts.en:
Amalia Felicita is 56 years old and earns her living by selling fruits and vegetables. She has been in this business for more than 11 years. Even though the work is hard, Amalia knows how to do her job well and is pleased to provide for her family’s daily needs.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy bananas, oranges, melons, mangos, watermelons, and other products. Her business is located outside of the bus terminal market where she can accommodate more than 20 customers at a time each day. She makes sure that she provides them with good service.

loans.use: to buy bananas, oranges, melons, mangos, watermelons, and other products.

loans.name: Clotilde

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA ALTERNATIVA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Clotilde; ella tiene 43 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de plastiqueria y negocio de tienda de abarrotes, en el negocio de plastiqueria la socia vende baldes,tinas,pelotas entre otros productos de plásticos, y en el negocio de tienda de abarrotes la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,leche,fideos entre otros productos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de plastiqueria y negocio de tienda de abarrotes, por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de plastiqueria. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como baldes, pelotas y lavaderos y también para comprar arroz, azúcar y fideos al por mayor para la tienda de abarrotes.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Nueva Alternativa" communal bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

This borrower's name is Ms. Clotilde. She is 43 years old, in a domestic partnership, and has two children. She divides her time between her daily activities, her plastic sales business, and her grocery store business. In her plastic sales business, Clotilde sells buckets, tubs, and balls, along with other products made of plastic. In her grocery store, she sells staple goods like rice, sugar, milk, noodles, and other products.

She would like to expand her plastic sales business as well as her grocery store business. It is through these small businesses that she helps her children to get ahead. Clotilde would like to expand and improve her two businesses. She is requesting this loan to buy merchandise like buckets, balls, and washbasins, as well as to buy rice, sugar, and noodles wholesale to stock her grocery store.

Clotilde is pleased to receive this loan and promises to comply with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her plastic sales business and her grocery store

loans.name: Juana

texts.es: Juana de 46 años, es una mujer ejemplar que lucha por la vida, sola. Para darles una adecuada calidad de vida sus 3 hijos. En unión familiar ellos viven en el caserío de Cumutay, en una humilde vivienda, según cuenta su hijo mayor salió de casa en busca de un futuro mejor. El ser padre y madre para los hijos es una difícil tarea que valerosamente afronta Juana, desde que su pareja sin importarte nada los abandonó aún cuando sus vástagos eran pequeños; para llenar la olla dice ella – desde hace 20 años me dedico a sembrar papa (tubérculo peruano), arveja y maíz, también crió cabezas de ganado, dos asnos y algunos ovinos y porcinos que al principio me confundían porque no sabia a quien atender primero, ahora las cosas han cambiado y gracias a Dios mis hijos están grandes y me ayudan a veces hasta me limito a preparar el almuerzo por las dolencias que me aquejan – resume, a la vez que cuenta que le gusta ver siempre limpio sus chacras por lo que los trabaja adecuadamente, además considera que su actividad es rentable por las satisfacciones y logros que le brinda en la vida, por lo que quiere seguir sembrando, además de ser la única actividad que conoce. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Además promete ser puntual con sus cuotas. Juana de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una bolsa de semilla de alverja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para comenzar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en: Juana is 46 years old. She is an exemplary woman who works hard, alone, to earn a living and provide an appropriate quality of life to her 3 children. As a family, they live in the settlement of Cumutay, in a humble home. She reports that her oldest son left home in search of a better future. Being both mother and father to her children is a difficult task which Juana has faced bravely since her partner, without caring about anything, abandoned them when his offspring were still small. "To fill the pot," as she says, for the past 20 years she has worked growing potatoes (a Peruvian variety of this root crop), peas and corn. She has also raised various heads of livestock, two asses and some sheep and pigs. She reports that "at first they confused me because I didn't know which one to take care of first, but now things have changed and thanks to God, my children are big and they help me at times, even when I am limited to preparing lunch because of the pains that plague me." She also says that she always likes to see her fields clean and neat because they are well-cultivated. She considers her work worthwhile because of the satisfaction and achievements it provides her in life, so that she wants to keep planting. In addition, it is the only work that she knows. She belongs to the “Lindo Amanecer de Cumutay” ["Beautiful Dawn of Cumutay"] communal bank, and this is their ninth loan with MFP, from which she expects a small loan so that she can fulfill her objectives. She also promises to be punctual with her payments. When Juana receives her support, she will invest the funds she is requesting in buying a bag of pea seeds and several sacks of natural fertilizers so she can get her next planting off to a successful start.

loans.use: to buy pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dionisia; la socia tiene 55 años de edad, la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 4 hijos de los cuales 3 de ellos son independientes y  el ultimo de 23 años, la socia trabaja junto a su conyugue en la carpintería que ambos tienes, la socia apoya en todo lo que puede, como en los acabados, decoraciones, lacas o barnices que se tenga que poner en algunos muebles, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de madera para la realización de trabajos a lo a largo de los siguientes 4 meses, la socia desea comprar madera por pies para los trabajos que realizaran en los próximos meses.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "MARIA ELENA MOYANO" which is located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco.

Mrs. Dionicia, 55, has a common-law husband and four children, three of whom are independent and the youngest, 23.  The member and her husband have a carpentry business where they both work.  She helps out in every way she can with the finishing, decoration, and varnish required for the furniture.  She has requested a loan to buy wood to fill orders over the next four months.  The wood will be bought by the foot.

Dionicia is grateful for the support and is committed to paying back the loan on time.

loans.use: To buy wood for orders to be filled over the coming months.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es: Celia, de 42 años convive desde hace 16 años con Eusebio, su esposo. Ambos tienen 3 hijos a los que quieren y cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en el caserío de Cumutay. Hace 2 años que su economía mejoró notablemente. Todo esto gracias a los ingresos económicos de casa; según cuenta mientras que su esposo trabaja como obrero en la construcción de una hidroeléctrica; ella se dedica a la agricultura. Ya tiene 20 años dedicándose a esta actividad, sus principales cultivos constan de arveja, papa y maíz; los cuales comercializa a un buen precio en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad, donde viaja después de cada cosecha. Gracias a la agricultura pudo obtener los 5 terrenos cultivables que ahora posee, como también 2 toros de buena raza, con los cuales ara la tierra. “Nunca dejaré de sembrar, siempre mantendré la costumbre familiar”, comenta muy orgullosa Celia. Pues para el futuro desea mejorar la calidad de sus alimentos. Ella pertenece al banco comunal “Lindo amanecer de cumutay” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de la colaboración de todos ustedes para continuar con sus objetivos. Además de prometer ser puntual con sus cuotas.  Celia de recibir su apoyo; invertirán el dinero solicitado en la compra de 2 bolsas de semilla de arveja y varios sacos de fertilizantes naturales para comenzar con éxito su próxima siembra.
texts.en:
Celia, 42, has lived with her husband, Eusebio, for 16 years.  They have three children, who they love very much, and all live together in their own house in the Cumutay rural community.  Two years ago her economy improved considerably, all thanks to earned household income.  According to her husband, who works as a bricklayer, Celia is involved in agriculture.  She has been a crop farmer for 20 years, mainly of peas, potatoes and corn.  She sells her produce for a good price at the wholesale market in the city where she travels after each harvest.  

Through her farm activity she was able to acquire five patches of cropland and two good oxen for ploughing the fields.  "I will never stop growing crops.  I'll always maintain the family tradition.", says Celia proudly.  In the future she would like to improve the quality of her produce.  She belongs to the communal bank "Lindo amanecer de Cumutay" and this is her ninth loan through MFP, where she hopes all of you will collaborate so she can continue meeting her goals.  She is committed to paying back the loan on time.  She plans to use the loan to buy two bags of pea seeds and several sacks of natural fertilizer to make the next planting season successful.

loans.use: To buy two bags of pea seeds and sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Graciela Maria

texts.es:
Graciela de 34 años de edad, vive con su esposo y sus 3 hijos en su casa propia, contando con los servicios de agua y luz,  está ubicada en el distrito de Pimentel que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Esta zona se dedica a la pesca y turismo.

La actividad que desarrolla Graciela es la venta de productos de primera necesidad (venta de arroz, leche, aceite, azúcar, etc.), en su domicilio desde hace unos 3 años, al encontrarse su negocio en su casa puede atender a cualquier hora, lo que le permite diferenciarse de otras tiendas y así pueda obtener más ingresos para solventar sus gastos diarios de su hogar.

El crédito solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1500 nuevos soles, el cual lo destinará para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería y poder ampliar su negocio con otros productos una vez que sus ventas aumenten.  El sueño de Graciela es tener más adelante una tienda más grande que le genere mayores ingresos para mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y lo logrará con su trabajo y empeño.
texts.en:
Graciela, 34, lives with her husband and three children in her own house which has running water and electricity.  It is located in Pimentel which belongs to the province of Chiclayo.  This area is known for its fishing and tourism.

Graciela sells basic need groceries (rice, milk, oil, sugar, etc.) out of her house, where she has been in business for three years.  Since the store is in her home she can attend to customers at any hour of the day, which gives her a competitive edge over other stores.  This allows her to increase her income and cover household expenses.

She is requesting a loan in the amount of 1,500 PEN through Edpyme Alternativa which she will use to buy more merchandise and expand her business with other products to increase sales.  Graciela's goal for the future is to have a large store that will generate more income so she can give her family a better lifestyle, through her hard work and efforts.

loans.use: To buy more merchandise to expand her store.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy sweets, detergents, basic grains, juices and sodas.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA ALTERNATIVA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Jose; el tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de plastiqueria, el lleva todo tipo de mercadería a los lugares como Pisaq, Calca y Urubamba, el socio trabaja en forma ambulatoria desde las 4:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de plastiqueria. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como baldes, pelotas y tinas.
                                               
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the communal bank "NUEVA ALTERNATIVA", which is located in the disctrict, province and department of Cusco.

Mr. Jose, 40, has a common-law wife and two children.  He alternates his daily activities with his plasticware business.  He sells all kinds of merchandise in places such as Pisaq, Calca and Urubamba.  He works as a street vendor from 4:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m. and is able to earn a living so his children can get ahead.  He wants to expand and improve his plastic business.  The loan he has requested will be used to buy buckets, balls and tubs.

The member is grateful for the loan and committed to paying it back on time.

loans.use: To buy plastic merchandise such as buckets, balls and tubs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy merchandise

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase merchandise to invest in and diversify her candy store business.

loans.name: Segundo Agustin

texts.es:
Segundo es un hombre soltero de 36 años de edad, vive en casa de unos familiares, la cual  es propia y cuenta con todos los servicio (agua, luz y desagüe), ubicada en la zona urbana del distrito de Pimentel que pertenece a la provincia de Chiclayo.  Los pobladores de éste distrito se dedican a la pesca y al turismo.

Segundo  labora desde hace unos 2 años realizando servicio de transporte público en su mototaxi (transporte que se utiliza para movilizarse en distancias cortas, con un cupo máximo de 3 personas) la cual trabaja diariamente mañana y tarde, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá solventar sus gastos y necesidades personales.

El crédito que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa es de 1000 nuevos soles y su destino será para realizar unos arreglos a su mototaxi y también a su casa, mejorando  la calidad de vida de él y seguir ayudando a sus familiares con los que vive.  Segundo es un hombre conocido  por ser trabajador, responsable que a punta de esfuerzo y empeño ha sabido salir adelante, con el objetivo que en un futura pueda adquirir otra mototaxi para seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Segundo is a 36 year old single man.  He lives in his relatives’ house.  The house is their own, and it has all of the basic services (water, electricity, and sewage).  The house is in the urban zone of the Pimentel district, Chiclayo province.  The inhabitants of this district devote themselves to fishing and tourism.

Segundo has worked for two years providing public transportation in his “mototaxi” (transportation for short distances, it holds a maximum of three people).  He works using his mototaxi day and night every day.  With the income he gets he is able to pay for his expenses and personal necessities. 

The 1,000 soles loan that he has requested from Edpyme Alternativa will be used for some repairs to his mototaxi.  It will also be used for some repairs to his home.  He will be improving his quality of life, and he will continue helping the family members with whom he lives.

Segundo is known to be a hard-working and responsible man.  Through his effort and determination he has known how to get ahead.  His objective for the future is to get another mototaxi and to continue working.

loans.use: to repair his "mototaxi" (three wheeled motorized vehicle) and his house.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA ALTERNATIVA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Karina; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de restaurant, ella prepara desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, ella prepara estofado de pollo, pollo al horno y caldos, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar la atención del negocio de restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como carne, pollo y verduras.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Karina belongs to the “Nueva Alternativa” (New Opportunity) Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Cusco district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Karina is 26 years old and single.  She alternates her daily activities with her restaurant business.  She makes breakfasts, lunches, and dinners.  She makes chicken stew, baked chicken, and soups.  She works from 8:00 a.m. until 7:00 p.m.  It is through this business that she gets her children ahead.

She wants to improve the service at her restaurant.  She is requesting the loan to buy ingredient like meat, chicken, and vegetables.

She is happy about the loan, and she pledges to make her payments.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like meat, chicken, and vegetables.

loans.name: Yanett Dionisia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yanett  la socia tiene 57 años de edad; la socia tiene 3 hijos de 26, 23, 19 años y es casada, la socia es enfermera de profesión y ella actualmente, está trabajando en  una institución publica, la socia alterna sus actividades y vende plata, ella compra al por mayor pulseras, collares, aretes, la socia también viaja dos veces al año al inicio del año y a mediados para la ciudad de Lima y trae ropa para la venta a sus amistades, y compañeras de trabajo.  Ella tiene años en este negocio de esta forma la socia incrementa su negocio. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de ropa al por mayor y para ello viajara a la ciudad de Lima para traer ropa para la venta.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Yanett belongs to the Maria Elena Moyano Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Huanchac district, Cusco province, Cusco department.

Yanett, age 57, is married and has three children; ages 26, 23, and 19.  She is a nurse by profession, and she is currently working in a public institution.  She alternates her business activities, and she sells silver.  

She buys wholesale bracelets, necklaces, and earrings.  She travels to the city of Lima twice a year, at the beginning of the year and in the middle of the year.  She brings back clothes to sell to her friends and work colleagues.  She has been in this business for years, and this is the way she increases her business.  

Yanett is requesting the loan to buy clothes wholesale and to travel to Lima to get the clothes to sell.

She is grateful for the loan she will get, and she pledges to make her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy clothes wholesale and to travel to Lima to get the clothes that she will sell.

loans.name: Vicente

texts.es:
Vicente de 42 años de edad, vive con su familia en su casa propia, cuenta con servicio de agua y luz, ubicada en la zona urbana de Pacanga que pertenece al departamento de la Libertad.  Esta zona se caracteriza por la actividad agrícola y ganadera.

Desde hace 6 años Vicente se dedica a la venta de reciclaje y al molido de botellas descartables, cuenta con su propio molino para realizar ese trabajo diariamente, tiene su propia clientela que le vende el producto, con el dinero que adquiera en su negocio será para cubrir las necesidades diarias de su hogar.

Al observar que su negocio va creciendo a creído conveniente solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3000 nuevos soles para la compra de otro molino para seguir moliendo su reciclaje, ya que se ha incrementado sus ventas, con los ingresos podrá pagar su crédito otorgado y tener algunas mejoras en su casa.  Vicente es una persona que con trabajo y dedicación a logrado tener lo que actualmente tiene y trata de sacar a su familia adelante, con el ideal que sus hijos tengan estudios superiores.
texts.en:
Vicente is 42 years old. He lives with his family in their own house. The house has water and electricity and it is located in the urban zone of Pacanga, which belongs to the department of La Libertad. This zone is characterized by agriculture and cattle.

For 6 years Vicente has been selling recycled materials and grinding disposable bottles. He has his own grinder so he can do this work every day. He has his own clients he sells the product to. With the money he receives from his business, he covers the daily necessities of his household.

Since he sees that his business is growing, he though it would be good to request a loan from Edpyme Alternativa for PEN 3,000.00 to buy another grinder so he can continue grinding his recyclables. Since his sales have been increasing, with his income he will pay back the loan and make some improvements to his house. Vicente is a person who with work and dedication has achieved what he currently has and tries to help his family get ahead, with the idea that his children should have a college education.

loans.use: to buy another grinder so he can continue grinding recyclable materials.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA ALTERNATIVA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Celia; ella tiene 35 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta, ella vende manzanas,platanos,naranjas,uvas entre otras frutas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 3:00 p.m y también la socia vende cds de música en forma ambulatoria, por medio de estos pequeños negocios saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de fruta y también mejorar el negocio de venta de cds. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar frutas como manzanas, naranjas, uvas, naranjas y plátanos al por mayor y también para comprar cds de música.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Introducing Celia, a member of “NUEVA ALTERNATIVA” (“New Alternative”), a communal bank located in the Cusco district, province and department.

Celia is 35 years old, she lives with her life-partner and she has 1 child. She alternates her daily chores with her fruit selling activity. She sells apples, plantains, oranges and grapes among other fruits. She works from 6 am to 3 pm, and she also sells music CDs in an itinerant manner. Thanks to these small activities she provides for her child. She wants to improve the fruits selling activity as well as improving the CDs sales activity. The loan she is requesting will be used to buy fruits such as apples, oranges, grapes and plantains at a wholesale price, as well as to buy music CDs.

She is happy about the loan and she commits to complying with the repayments of her dues.

loans.use: To buy apples, oranges, grapes, and plantain at a wholesale price, as well as to buy music CDs.

loans.name: Kokouda

texts.fr:
Kokouda est un homme âgé de 32 ans. Il est celibataire. Il a 01 enfant.
 Kokouda travaille comme revendeur de friperie depuis 2000. Il achète les produits à LOME. 
Kokouda a requis son second cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des chemises, des tee-shirt et des jeans.
texts.en: Kokouda is 32 years old, single and the father of one child. He has been selling second-hand clothes since 2000. He buys his supplies in Lomé. Kokouda came to the microfinance institution WAGES and applied for his second loan to buy shirts, T-shirts and jeans.

loans.use: to buy bales of second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Zoraida Felipa

texts.es:
Zoraida, habita en la ciudad de León, esta casada, es madre de dos hijos, tiene 52 años de edad. Ella es comerciante se dedica hacer y vender pan. Tiene su panadería en  su casa de habitación donde elaboran pan simple y pan dulce inicio en este negocio hace mas de 18 años con capital que su esposo puso y han venido los dos trabajando juntos hasta lograr poner la panadería, ellos distribuyen su producto en los barrios aledaños a la  cuidad de León. 
Requiere el préstamo para comprar materia prima como harina, aceite, levadura, manteca, azúcar para elaborar pan. Esta inversión le ayudara a tener material para producir almacenar para resistir un poco el alza de los precios. En sus próximos planes esta comprar un horno industrial, también adquirir un microbús para repartir pan, quiere hacer crecer su negocio, mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Zoraida lives in the town of León, she is 52 years old, she is married and she is the mother of two children. She is retailer engaging in preparing and selling bread. She has set her bakery in her house, where she prepares salty and sweetened breads. She started this activity more than 18 years ago thanks to her husband’s money, and they have been working together until they were able to open the bakery. They distribute their products in the adjoining neighborhoods of the town of León.
The loan she is requesting will be used to buy basic ingredients such as flour, oil, yeast, butter and sugar. This investment will help her gaining the ingredients to produce and store [bread] in order to face a little the rising of prices. Her future plans involve buying an industrial oven, as well as a minibus to distribute bread. She wants her activity to grow in order to improve her family’s standard of living.

loans.use: to buy flour, oil, yeast, butter and sugar to make bread.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy rice, beans, sugar, vegetables, meat and oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To by ceramic tiles.

loans.name: Elena Nancy

texts.es:
Elena es madre de familia de 44 años, vive con su menor hijo en su casa propia, cuenta con el servicio de agua y luz, ubicado en el distrito de San José que pertenece al departamento de la Libertad.  Zona de actividad agrícola, ganadera y turística.

Elena cuenta con su negocio de venta de comida en su domicilio, brinda pensión a los trabajadores del Banco de la Nación de la ciudad donde vive, actividad que realiza desde  hace varios años, cuenta con su propia clientela, pero a pensado en solicitar un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa  de 1800 nuevos soles para comprar insumos y utensilios, con la finalidad de seguir brindando un buen servicio y satisfaciendo las necesidades de sus, con los ingresos que obtenga podrá cubrir su crédito y mejorar la calidad de vida de su hijo.

Con su trabajo y sus ganas de salir adelante Elena se ha ganado la confianza y el respeto de sus vecinos, demostrando que cuando uno se propone una meta se puede hacer realidad, con el objetivo de que su hijo tenga un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Elena is a mother and 44 years old. She lives with her youngest son in their own house, which has water and electricity. It is located in the district of San José, which belongs to the department of La Libertad, which has agriculture, cattle, and tourism.

Elena has a business selling food in her home and she rents rooms to workers from the Bank of the Nation in the city where she lives. She has had this business for several years and has her own customers. She thought to request a loan from Edypme Alternative for PEN 1,800.00 to buy ingredients and utensils, with the goal of providing better service and satisfying the needs of her customers. With the income she receives she will be able to cover her loan and improve the quality of life for her son.

Through her hard work and her desire to get ahead, Elena has earned the trust and respect of her neighbors, demonstrating that when she sets a goal, she can make it into reality, so that her son can have a better future.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and utensils so she can continue making the food she offers to her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy materials such as wood and paint to make chess sets.

loans.name: Agbeko

texts.fr:
Agbeko est un homme âgé de 50 ans. Il est marié å une revendeuse Il a 02 enfants.
Agbeko travaille comme revendeur de lames et friperie depuis 2008. Il vend à toutes personnes de façon ambulante. Il achète les produits au GHANA. 
Agbeko a requis son second cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des lames et des friperies
texts.en: Agbeko is 50 years old. He is married to a merchant and is the father of two children. He has been selling blades and second-hand clothes since 2008. He hawks through the streets and sells to passers-by. He buys his supplies in Ghana. Agbeko came to the microfinance institution WAGES and applied for his second loan to buy blades and second-hand clothes.

loans.use: to buy blades and second-hand clothes.

loans.name: Yovanna

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “NUEVA ALTERNATIVA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Yovanna; ella tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, polos, chompas y casacas y también la socia tiene una jugueria donde prepara diferentes sabores de jugos, la socia por medio de estos pequeños negocios saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de ropas y ampliar el negocio de jugueria. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar pantalones, chompas, polos y blusas y también para comprar frutas como manzanas, naranjas, uvas y plátanos.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Yovanna belongs to the “Nueva Alternativa” (New Alternative) Communal Bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Yovanna is 32 years old, living in a common-law marriage, and has 1 child. She spends her days at her business selling clothing, including pants, polo shirts, sweaters, and zip jackets. Also, she has a fruit juice making stall where she prepares different flavors of juices. By this means, she advances her child. Yovanna wants to expand her clothing store and her juice stall.

Yovanna is requesting a loan to buy pants, sweaters, polo shirts, and blouses, and also to buy fruit such as apples, oranges, grapes, and plantains.

Yovanna looks forward to the loan and promises to comply with the schedule of payments.

loans.use: buy pants, sweaters, polo shirts, and blouses to sell, and also to buy fruit (apples, oranges, grapes and plantains) for her fruit juice stand.

loans.name: Magali Yolanda

texts.en:
Magali lives and works in Pedro Vicente Maldonado, a canton in the west part of the province of Pichincha in Ecuador. Pedro Vicente Maldonado, named after the 18th-century Ecuadoran scientist, has a pleasant subtropical climate and is known for its natural beauty and agricultural economy.

Magali, 21 and single, lives in a rented home with her newborn child. Though Magali has only a middle-school education, she supports herself through her entrepreneurialism and hard work. Magali has been raising animals for two years and also works part-time as a maid. While initially she had trouble understanding how to run her own business, through her experiences, successes, and occasional failures, she has persevered.

This will be Magali's first loan through Fundación Alternativa, which she will use to buy piglets and feed. Her greatest struggle in this business are the extremely long hours - she begins work at 7 a.m. and isn't done until midnight. She hopes that this loan will support her business, and her dream is to own her own home.

loans.use: to buy piglets and feed.

loans.name: Marcela Del Pilar

texts.es:
Marcela de 26 años de edad, es soltera, vive en casa de sus padres y hermano,  cuenta con servicios sólo de luz, ubicada en la zona rural del distrito La Matanza que pertenece al departamento de Piura.  Toda esta zona sus pobladores se dedican a la agricultura, ganadería y artesanía.

Marcela se dedica a la venta de cerveza, actividad que realiza desde hace algunos años, su negocio lo tiene en su domicilio, su clientela se incrementa mayormente los fines de semana donde realizan fiestas, se ha incrementado sus ingresos últimamente para mejorar su calidad de vida.

Teniendo la oportunidad de crecer Marcela a solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1500 nuevos soles para comprar mayor cantidad de cerveza y también empezar a vender gaseosas y agua mineral, con la finalidad de obtener mayores ganancias y así sus clientes aumenten, para solventar el crédito otorgado y obtener mayores comodidades en su casa para sus padres.
texts.en:
Marcela is 26 years old, single, and lives in the house of her parents and her brother which has only  electrical services. It is located in the rural zone of La Matanza district, Piura department. Residents of this district are involved in agriculture, cattle raising, and artisan crafts.

Marcela sells beer, as she has done for some years. Her business is located in her home, and her customer base increases significantly on weekends when parties are held. She has increased her income recently and improved her quality of life.

Having the opportunity to grow, Marcela is requesting a loan through Edpyme Alternativa for 1,500 new sols to buy a large quantity of beer and also, to begin selling soft drinks and mineral water. This should increase her earnings and the number of customers as well, helping her pay off the loan and obtain greater comfort in her home for her parents.

loans.use: buy more beer and expand her business with soft drinks and mineral water.

loans.name: Ayélé

texts.fr:
Ayélé est une femme  âgée de 45 ans. Elle est célibataire. Elle a 02 enfants. 
Ayélé travaille comme couturière et revendeuse de bazins depuis 1996. Elle achète les produits à LOME et au MALI.
Ayélé a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des bazins.
texts.en: Ayélé is 45 years old, single and the mother of two children. She has been a seamstress and retailer of basins since 1996. She buys her supplies in Lomé and in the Republic of Mali. Ayélé came to the microfinance institution WAGES and applied for her first loan to buy basins.

loans.use: to buy high-quality basins.

loans.name: Nancy Violeta

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy; la socia tiene 55 años de edad, la socia tiene 3 hijos de 36, 31, 28 años de edad, la socia es casada, la socia tiene una tienda la cual antes solía ser panadería y luego fue refaccionada para una tienda de abarrotes, ahora ella desea arreglar el piso que es de cemento y ponerle piso de mayólica para poder alquilar su tienda a terceros y de este modo cobrar alquileres mensuales de su tienda. La socia dice que cuando ella tenia la tienda era muy tedioso ya que todo el día dedicaba todo el tiempo a la atención de su tienda sin poderse mover ahora ella decidió alquilarla y le rentara mensual y de mejor manera si ella no se quedara todo el tiempo y el día en casa con la tienda. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de materiales como mayólicas y del obrero para arreglar el piso de la tienda antes de ofrecer en alquiler.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Nancy, 55, is a member of the “María Elena Moyano” communal bank located in Huanchac District in Cusco Province and Department.  She has three children who are 36, 31 and 28 years of age.  She’s married.  She has a store that used to be a bakery but was later remodeled into a grocery store. Now, she wants to fix the floor, which is cement, and tile it so that she can rent it out to others and collect rent every month.

She says that when she used to have the store it was very tedious because she spent all her time all day tending to the store without being able to move away from it so she decided to rent it out and collect monthly rent payments and not have to stay home all the time watching over the store.

She is asking for the loan to buy materials like tile and to pay the laborer who will fix the store’s floor prior to her putting it up for rent.  She is grateful for the support she’ll get and pledges to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy tile and pay labor costs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy ingredients for food preparation.

loans.name: Somos Impacto 2006 Group

texts.es: L. Sra. Dina Ygnacia es divorciada, tiene 2 hijos, actualmente es integrante en L. alcancía comunal “Somos Impacto 2006” grupo  conformado por 9  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Dina Ygnacia,  trabaja desD. hace  30 años en L. venta D. anticuchos, pancita y menú, este negocio surge a raíz D. su divorcio,  ya que elL. tenía que trabajar para mantener a sus 2  hijos  y es así que empezó vendiendo en L. puerta D. su casa anticuchos con el tiempo se hizo más conocida y  empezó a tener mayor cantidad D. clientes con el tiempo su negocio fue creciendo y es así que obtuvo mayores ingresos y empezó a construir su casa, hoy en día alquiL. su casa y sigue vendiendo anticuchos y menú.  Dina Ygnacia,  nos cuenta que todo lo consiguió con mucho trabajo y perseverancia ya que su motivación eran sus hijos y sus deseos D. superación eran más grandes que sus problemas,  gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, su hijos ya son adultos  y ambos han puesto una empresa D. confección D. ropa, y sobre todo elL. cuenta con una mejor calidad D. vida , con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar mercadería insumos , Sabemos que Dina  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Dina Ygnacia is divorced; she has two children.  She’s currently a member of the “Somos Impacto 2006” (We are Impact 2006) communal bank that has 9 members who carry out a variety of commercial activities.  


Dina Ygnacia has worked for the last 30 years selling anticuchos (grilled, skewered meat fast food), pancita (grilled pig stomach) and daily meals.  The business arose from her divorce because she had to work to support her two children so she started to sell anticuchos at her front door and in time became better known and started to get larger numbers of customers and the business started to grow and she earned better profits and started to build her house.  Today, she rents her house and continues selling anticuchos and daily meals.


Dina Ygnacia tells us that everything she got she acquired through much effort and perseverance because her children were her motivation and her desire to get ahead was bigger than her problems.  Thanks to her effort and dedication she’s attained better income and her children are now adults who have established a clothing manufacturing firm.  Above all, she has good quality of life. 


With the goal of continuing to continue growing, she’s asked for a new loan to buy ingredients.  We know that Dina Ygnacia will meet her goals with much effort and work and that Edaprospo loans will help her.

loans.use: to buy meat.

loans.name: Ivan Arturo

texts.en:
Ivan lives and works in Pedro Vicente Maldonado, a canton in the west of the province of Pichincha in Ecuador. Pedro Vicente Maldonado, named after the 18th-century Ecuadoran scientist Pedro Vicente Maldonado, has a pleasant subtropical climate and is known for its natural beauty and agricultural economy. 

Ivan is twenty-one years old and is single. He lives with his mother Rita who, at 44 years old, works in their food stall. In his spare time, Ivan plays sports and plans for the development of his business.

This is Ivan's first loan with Fundación Alternativa. Ivan will use this loan to buy pigs and feed. He works long hours--from 6 a.m. to 5 p.m., but he hopes to expand his business and his dream is to one day own and operate his own full-service farm.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: To buy medicine, vitamins, supplements, and ointments.

loans.name: Eléonora

texts.fr:
Eléonora est une femme  âgée de 42 ans. Elle est mariée å un gestionnaire. Elle a 03 enfants. 
Eléonora travaille comme revendeuse de pagnes teintés depuis 1999. Elle achète les produits à LOME. Elle travaille avec 01 personne.
Eléonora a requis son premier  cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des pagnes.
texts.en: Éléonora is 42 years old and the mother of three children. She is married to a manager. She has been a retailer of colored pagnes (West African cloth) since 1999. She buys her supplies in Lomé. She has hired one person. Éléonora came to the microfinance institution WAGES and applied for her first loan to buy pagnes.

loans.use: to buy pagnes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay her son's graduation costs.

loans.name: Carlos Mauricio

texts.es:
A la vivienda del señor Carlos le está haciendo falta la construcción de un cuarto en la parte trasera.
Solicita un préstamo para comprar el material que es block, cemente, arena y varilla, para empezar a construir de un cuarto que será para sus dos hijos que tiene. 
Don Carlos es empleado de una compañía de publicaciones en el aria de repartidor y mensajería, el sueldo que recibe es la fuente de ingreso que tiene para su familia y con el cual pagara el crédito.
Desean que sus hijos tenga su propia recamara y espacio en la casa y donde puedan realizar las tareas necesaria de la escuela.
texts.en:
Carlos’ house needs to have a room added to the rear.  He is asking for a loan to buy materials like concrete block, cement, sand and iron rods to start building the room that will be for his two children.

Carlos works as a Deliveryman for a publications and package delivery firm.  His salary is the family’s source of income and what he’ll use to repay the loan.

They wish that their sons have their own bedroom and space in the house where they can do their school homework.

loans.use: to start building a room in the rear of his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building materials and supplies.

loans.name: María Elena

texts.es:
María Elena es una mujer de 25 años que vive en San Miguel de Los Bancos, es madre soltera y su hijo hoy en día tiene 8 años de edad. Vive en casa de su madre que se llama también María y tiene 53 años, ella trabaja lavando a mano ropa de otras personas.

María Elena vivió la falta de oportunidades de trabajo y ya que debía mantener a su hijo aprendió de un amigo  la manera de fabricar productos desinfectantes para la limpieza doméstica hace dos años. Desde entonces se dedica de lleno a esta actividad. Diariamente trabaja hasta 10 horas y aunque es un trabajo muy duro a María lo más difícil de aprender fue la venta ya que según nos cuenta que no tenía experiencia en esto. Ella recibe ayuda de su sobrina quien es empleada en el sector público y en su tiempo libre la visita. María quiere invertir en materia prima para hacer sus productos por lo que necesita un crédito y así lograr su objetivo que forma parte de su gran meta.

Ella adora las actividades al aire libre y practica el fútbol, trata de compartir al máximo con su hijo y madre, ella sueña con hacer que su negocio crezca y vender su producto a nivel nacional.
texts.en:
María Elena is a 25-year-old woman living in San Miguel de los Bancos.  She’s a single mother of a son who is 8 years old now.  She lives in her mother’s house.  Her mother is also María and is 53 years old.  She works hand washing other people’s clothes.

María Elena suffered the lack of employment opportunities and, needing to support her son, learned how to make disinfectant supplies for home cleaning two years ago from a friend.  Since then, she’s been totally involved in this activity.  She works up to ten hours daily because it’s very hard work.  What was most difficult for María to learn was sales because, according to her, she had no experience in that.  A niece, who is employed in the public sector, visits her in her free time and helps her.  María wants to invest in raw materials to make her products so needs a loan to reach the objective that’s part of her great goal.

She loves activities in the fresh air and plays soccer.  She tries to share to the greatest extent possible with her mother and son.  She dreams with making the business grow and to sell her products nationally.

loans.use: to buy raw materials to continue making disinfectants.

loans.name: Enrique

texts.es:
El señor Enrique es soltero pero tiene bajo su responsabilidad a sus padres quienes ya son adultos mayores.
Solicita el préstamo para comprar el materia para la construcción que es, arena, cemento y block, ya que el se encargara de realizar la mejora en horario adicional a su trabajo. 
Enrique desea mejorar la casa donde vive sus padres y que estén seguras ya que todo el día están solo porque el tiene que ir a trabajar. 
Es empleado de una compañía de construcción como albañil, con una parte del sueldo pagara el crédito ya que es el fuente de ingreso que tiene para El y sus padres. 
Don Enrique ya ha tenido un crédito con FVP y sus pagos fueron puntuales.
texts.en:
Mr. Enrique is single but he is responsible for caring for his elderly parents.

He is requesting a loan to buy constructions materials, specifically sand, cement, and concrete blocks. He will be responsible for making the improvements in addition to his work schedule. Enrique wants to improve the house where his parents live and to make sure it is secure, since they are alone all day when he has to go to work.

Enrique works for a construction company as a bricklayer. He will use part of his salary to repay the loan, as his job is the source of income for him and his parents.

Enrique previously had a loan with FVP [Fundacion para la Vividenda Progresiva, which merged with Credituyo in early 2010] and his repayments were on time.

loans.use: to build a fence around his parents' house

loans.name: Lisset  De Los Santos

texts.es:
Liset, de 34 años, es madre de tres niños, de 14,12 y 2 años respectivamente, es originaria de  Telica una comunidad aledaña a la ciudad de León, pero vive en le centro de León, su nivel de estudio es básico solo finalizo el tercer grado de primaria. Ella es comerciante, tiene una pulpería en su casa.  Inicio a los 31 años de edad, este ha sido su segundo negocio anteriormente vendía fritangas (comidas fritas) en su casa. Puso la pulpería después de un sueño que ella tuvo, pues en su sueño vio los estantes llenos de mercadería y se lo dijo a su esposo el creyó en ella y le regalo un pequeño capital para comenzar con la pulpería, la suegra le ayudo a conseguir los estantes y de esta manera fue que poco a poco fue estableciendo su pulpería. Su esposo la sigue apoyando con lo que el gana en un taller mecánico que es donde el trabaja.
Requiere el préstamo para comprar granos básicos, arroz, azúcar, aceite y productos varios de consumo diario. Invirtiendo en el negocio y ofreciendo nuevos y mejores productos podrá satisfacer la demanda de sus clientes, mejorar sus ventas. En lo próximo quiere comprar estantes de aluminio,2 vitrinas y un freezer para almacenar productos lácteos.
texts.en:
Liset, age 34, has three children; ages 14, 12, and 2.  She is from Telica, a community on the outskirts of the city of León.  However, she lives in the center of León.  Her level of education is basic; she only finished the third grade.

She is a businesswoman, and she has a store in her house.  She started when she was 31 years old.  This has been her second business.  She previously sold fried food at her house.  

She set up the store after a dream that she had.  In the dream she saw the shelves filled with merchandise.  She told this to her husband, and he believed in her.  He gave her a small amount of capital to start the store.  Her mother-in-law helped her get the shelves.  That is the way that she, little by little, was establishing her store.  Her husband continues to support her with what he earns in a mechanic’s shop, which is where he works.

She needs the loan to buy basic grains, rice, sugar, oil, and various products for daily consumption.  Investing in the business and offering new and improved products will be able to meet the demands of her customers and improve her sales.  With the next one she wants to buy aluminum shelves, two display cases, and a freezer to store dairy products.

loans.use: to buy basic grains rice, sugar, oil, and products for daily consumption.

loans.name: Evelia Del Socorro

texts.es: Evelia Del Socorro de 48 años se dedica a la venta de cosméticos.  Ella tiene 2 hijos con los que sueña ver prósperos y productivos y por eso se esmera por lograr una educación de calidad y es precisamente su mayor motivación en el trabajo que desempeña como comerciante. Evelia inició su negocio con capital propio. La competencia de su mercado es muy fuerte y para ella este es su mayor desafío, pero como maneja muy bien sus relaciones con los proveedores, logra precios que traslada a sus clientes, con los cuales los mantiene fieles. Este crédito es para la compra de  cremas, tratamientos, shampoo, lápiz labial, brillos, lápiz de ojos entre otras.
texts.en: Evelia del Socorro, 48, sells cosmetics.  She has 2 children and she dreams of seeing them prosperous and productive and that is why she is making the effort so that they receive a quality education.   This is precisely her main motivation in her work as a businesswoman.  Evelia began her business with her own money.  The competition in this market is very strong and for her this has been the biggest challenge.  However, since she maintains good relations with her suppliers, she has been able to give good prices to her customers, and they are loyal to her.  She will use the loan to buy creams, facial treatments, shampoo, lipsticks, nailpolish, eyeliners, etc.

loans.use: To buy creams, facial treatments, shampoo, lipsticks, nailpolish,  eye liners

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Fortunata Marcela

texts.es: Fortunata tiene 43 años de edad es conviviente y tiene 3 hijos la cual la última de sus hijas dependen de ella. Fortunata  se dedica al tejido de chompas, colchas, chalinas, entre otros accesorios, que son elaborados  en hilo y lana,  gracias a su trabajo Fortunata ha podido ayudar a su esposo con los gastos del hogar ya que actualmente  no cuenta con un trabajo seguro, también seguir ayudando a su última hija con sus estudios de enfermería. A futuro a Fortunata le gustaría poner un taller donde pueda enseñar a tejer y así obtener más ganancias para seguir apoyando a su familia. Con el préstamo solicitado piensa comprar en mayor cantidad hilo y lana ya que por esta  temporada tiene varios pedidos. Fortunata agradece a los prestamistas KIVA.
texts.en: Fortunata, 43, lives with a partner and has 3 children, the youngest of whom is dependent upon her.  Fortunata has a business knitting sweaters, bedspreads, scarves and other accessories from yarn and wool.  Thanks to this work, Fortunata has been able to help her husband with the household expenses, since at this time he does not have steady work.  She is also helping her youngest daughter with her nursing studies.  In the future, Fortunata would like to set up a workshop where she could teach knitting and in this way have more income to continue supporting her family.  With the loan requested, Fortunata will buy yarn and wool in bulk, since in this season she has a number of orders.  Fortunata thanks the Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to buy yarn and wool

loans.name: Les Coeur Angelique Group

texts.fr:
Elardain est le coordinateur de son groupe coeur angeliques.  Il est  marié il a 3 enfants.

Elardain habite dans la ville de ouanaminthe d’Haiti. Elardain a dirigé son business pendant les 7 dernières années.

Elardain voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l’achat des charbon. Elardain espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business.

Des autres membres de coeur angeliques ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre du tennis, du riz et du poisson.

Elardain dit que son défi principal est manque d’acheteur constant .

Elardain dit que ses buts principaux sont l’augmentation du bussiness. Son rêve est l’achat d’un camion pour transporter les charbon.
texts.en:
Elardain is the coordinator of his group “Coeur Angélique” (angelic heart). He is married with three children. He lives in Haiti, in the city of Ouanaminthe. He has been running his coal business for the past seven years.

Elardain wishes to use this loan to invest in the purchase of coal. He hopes that this will help him to expand his business. 

Other group members are seeking a loan for such businesses as selling sneakers, rice or fish.

Elardain believes that his main challenge is the lack of return customers. His main goal is to expand his business, and his ambition is to buy a truck to transport the coal.

loans.use: to buy coal for resale

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy goods for his store.

loans.name: Doris Alcantar

texts.es: La señora Doris vive en la zona de Pampahasi central que esta ubicada a veinte minutos del centro de la ciudad de la paz. Ella vive en casa de sus padres junto a su esposo y su pequeña hija. Doris se dedica a vender ropa de  segunda mano en su puesto de venta en la feria 16 de julio de la ciudad del alto. Esta feria tiene lugar los días jueves y domingo y es la feria más grande de esta ciudad. Su esposo, juan trabaja con su minibús de once pasajeros en servicio público. Él presta sus servicios en el sindicato de transportes que esta compuesta por varios grupos y cinco líneas de transporte de minibuses pequeños. La señora Doris trabaja con préstamos en emprender desde el año 2005 y durante todo este tiempo siempre ha demostrado ser una cliente muy puntual y responsable con sus pagos. En esta ocasión solicita el préstamo para la compra de fardos de ropa para la temporada de frio.  El mayor anhelo de Doris y juan es ampliar sus negocios y comprar otro minibús.
texts.en: Doris lives in the central Pampahasi area that is located 20 minutes from the center of the city of La Paz. She lives in her parents' house along with her husband and their small daughter. Doris is dedicated to selling second-hand clothing from her stall in the July 16 market in the city of Alto.This market takes places on Thursdays and Sundays and is the biggest market in this city. Her husband, Juan, works with his 11-passenger minibus for public service. He loans his services in the transportation syndicate that is made up of various groups and five lines of small minibus transportation. Doris has worked with loans from Emprender since the year 2005 and during all this time she has always proven to be a very punctual and responsible customer with her payments. On this occasion, she is requesting a loan to purchase bundles of clothing for the cold season. Doris' and Juan's greatest dream is to expand their businesses and buy another minibus.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of winter clothes.

loans.name: Hugo Jose

texts.es:
Hugo tiene 51 años de edad trabaja arduamente como gestor aduanero desde hace varios años es casado con dos hijos de los cuales uno se encuentra en edad escolar.
don Hugo visita nuevamente las oficinas de ceprodel para solicitar un prestamo para la compra de materiales de construccion para continuar con las mejoras progresiva de su casa de habitacion, el realizara el cambio de techo de su casa de habitacion por lo que comprara zinc, perlinez, pintura.
