a gradece a ceprodel por brindarle la oportunidad de seguir mejorando su casa ade habitacion por lo que ahora contara con una mejor casa para el y su familia.
texts.en:
Hugo is 51 years old and has worked hard as a customs officer for many years.  He is married and has two children, one of which is school aged. 

Hugo visited the Ceprodel offices to ask for a loan to purchase construction materials to continue with his gradual repairs to his home.  He is going to put a new roof on the house, so he needs to purchase zinc, roof beams, and paint.  

He is thankful to Ceprodel for providing the opportunity to continue improving his home so that he can have a better house for himself and his family.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Gabriela Rosalia

texts.es: La señorita Gabriela  es  clienta nueva de la institución  se dedica a la cría de ganado vacuno y a la producción de leche, la presente cliente es soltera vive en la casa de sus padres ubicado en la zona de Chinchaya los padres cuentan con un terreno donde cultivan diferentes productos, ellos son agricultores y la Señorita Gabriela se dedica a la ganadería, la  clienta tiene dos vacas y una vaca con su cría y ella se dedica  a vender leche a una empresa muy reconocida de la ciudad, con el dinero del crédito desea comprarse una vaquita mas y asi poder tener mas producción de leche,  A pesar de su corta edad nuestra cliente es muy emprendedora y tiene una actitud de responsabilidad.
texts.en: Gabriela is a new customer of the institution who is dedicated to raising cattle and producing milk. She is single and lives in her parents' house located in the area of Chincaya. Her parents have land where they cultivate different products. They are farmers and Gabriela is dedicated to livestock. She has two cows and one cow with its calf and she is dedicated to selling milk to a business well-known in the city. With the money from the loan, she wishes to buy one more calf and therefore be able to have more milk production. Despite her young age, our customer is very entrepreneurial and has a responsible attitude.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Señor De Muruhuay De Huayaringa Group

texts.es:
L.  Alcancía Comunal “SEÑOR D. MURUHUAY D. HUAYARINGA” es un nuevo grupo que están dispuesto a trabajar en equipo, y está conformado por 09 mujeres emprendedoras y comprometidas con el Programa- Prosperidad.
Obdulia    tiene 33 años D. edad es casada y tiene 2 hijos elL. junto a su familia  radican en un centro poblado D. Huayaringa. Obdulia lleva 08 años  dedicándose  a L. confección D. accesorios como colchas, chompas, chalinas, entre otros, que son tejidos en hilo y lana, gracias a su trabajo  ha podido ayudar a su esposo  aportando con los gastos del hogar y con los estudios D. sus menores hijos. El anhelo D. Obdulia es D. instalar en su vivienda una panadería donD. pueda exhibir diversos postres ya que tiene algunos conocimientos sobre repostería. Con el préstamo solicitado va a comprar hilo y lana para sus tejidos. L. Nueva Alcancía Comunal “Señor D. Muruhuay D. Huayaringa” están muy agradecidos por el préstamo.
texts.en:
The community bank, "Senor D. Muruhuay D. Huayaringa," is a new group that is willing to work together and is maD. up of 9 entrepreneurial and trustworthy women with the Prosperity Program.

Obdulia is 33 years old and is married and has two children. AlongsiD. her family, she resides in the town of Huayaringa. Obdulia has 8 years experience dedicating herself to making accessories like blankets, sweaters, scarves, among others, that are knit from thread and wool. Thanks to her job she has been able to help her husband with the household bills and the studies of her youngest children. Obdulia's dream is to install a bakery in her house  where she can display different pastires since she's already known for her baking. With the loan requested, she is going to buy thread and wool for her knitting. The new community bank, Senor D. Muruhuay D. Huayaringa, is very thankful for the loan.

loans.use: to buy thread and wool.

loans.name: Esther De Garates Group

texts.fr:
Ronald est le coordinateur de son groupe Esther de Garates. Il n’est pas marié il n’a  d’enfant.

Ronald habite dans la ville de GARATES d’Haiti où de l’éléctricité est rare et de l’eau est très limitée.

Ronald a dirigé son business pendant les 3 dernières années. Ronald voudrait utiliser cet emprunt pour investir dans l’achat du bois. Il espère que cet emprunt l’aidera à agrandir son business.

Des autres membres d’ESTHER ont besoin d’un emprunt pour tels commerces comme vendre du charbon, du riz et du poisson.

Ronald dit que ses buts principaux sont l’augmentation du bussiness. Ronald vous remercie pour votre soutien.
texts.en:
Ronald is the organizer of his group, Esther de Garates. He is not married and doesn't have children. Ronald lives in the city of Garates in Haiti, where electricity is scarce and water access very limited.

Ronald has been managing his business for the past three years. He would like to use this loan to invest in buying timber. He hopes that this loan will help him grow his business.

Some of the other members of Esther need a loan for such trades as coal, rice and fish retail.

Ronald says that his main objective is to grow his business. Ronald thanks you for your support.

loans.use: to purchase timber.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: El señor Cesar oriundo de puerto rico - el Torno, casado con la Sra. y tienen dos hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, su domicilio es alquilado se encuentra ubicado en la zona San Andrés, es de ocupación carpintero, trabaja en su propio taller ubicado en el mismo barrio en el domicilio de su padre ya hace unos cinco años se dedica a esta labor, el destino del crédito es para refacción de su taller ( levantar su techo), se siente agradecido con la institución por el apoyo que se le ha brindado.
texts.en: Cesar is a native of Puerto Rico, el Torno. He is married and has two children who are school age. His house is rented and is located in the area of San Andres. He is a carpenter. He works in his own shop located in the same neighborhood in his father's house. He has been dedicated to this work for five years already. The loan is destined for improvements on his shop (to raise the roof). He is thankful to the institution for the support provided to him.

loans.use: to make improvements to his shop.

loans.name: Nieve Piedad

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal La Dolorosa Del Pechiche.

La señora Nieve es socia fundadora del Banco comunal, le gusta porque los créditos han sido como una bendición. Tiene 72 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene 4 hijos, todos  ya son mayores de edad, en su casa aun vive un hijo que ya está casado pero vive allí junto a su esposa y dos pequeños hijos. Su esposo  está enfermo y ya no trabaja.

Ella realiza el crédito para el negocio familiar,  su esposo tiene una fábrica de ladrillos pero que por motivos de enfermedad ahora su hijo se hace cargo del negocio, por eso ella realiza el crédito ya que ahora ellos trabajan en sociedad pues él se encarga de la elaboración de los ladrillos y ella en su casa de las ventas, ya que hasta su casa llegan los comerciantes que luego se encargan de llevarlos a otros lugares a entregar, trabajan de lunes a viernes desde las 8h00 hasta las 18h00 y llevan dedicados a esta actividad por más de 40 años desde que su esposo trabajaba.
 
Este crédito es para comprar leña, aserrín, agua, palmito que son los materiales que emplean para elaborar los ladrillos.
 
Sus sueños son seguir con el negocio y tener fuerzas para continuar trabajando.
texts.en:
In Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its great diversity of typical products, like, for example, the straw hats known inside and outside the country, the members of the Dolorosa Del Pechiche community bank meet every 15 days.

Nieve is a founding member of the community bank. She likes it because the loans have been like a blessing. She is 72 years old. She is married and, from this relationship, has four children, all of whom are adults. One son still lives in her house even though he is married but he lives there with his wife and two small children. Her husband is sick and does not work anymore.

She requested the loan for the family business. Her husband has a brick factory but, due to illness reasons, now their son is in charge of the business. As a result, she has requested the loan since now they work in partnership as he is responsible for making bricks and she is at home selling since traders come to the house and are responsible for taking them to other places for delivery. They work Monday to Friday from 8AM until 6PM and have been dedicated to this activity for more than 40 years since her husband worked.

This loan is to buy wood, sawdust, water and palm which are the materials they use to make bricks.

Their dreams are to continue with the business and to have the strength to continue working.

loans.use: to buy wood, sawdust, water and palm.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Carlos Manuel

texts.es:
Es de la ciudad de Managua, el señor Carlos Manuel, tiene a su cargo una persona es luchadora, responsable, con buenos valores y principios  morales, que lucha para sacar adelante sus hijos para un futuro mejor. 

A esta oficina de ceprodel se presento  a solicitar crédito que será utilizado para remodelación de su vivienda, en hacer un porche,  para darle más seguridad  a su familia y agradece a ceprodel la oportunidad con este desembolso compra materiales de construcción tales como bloque, hierro, cemento, arena.
texts.en:
Carlos Manuel is from the city of Managua, and he has one person under his care.  He is tenacious and responsible with good values and moral principles.  He works hard to get his children ahead in order to have a better future.

He came to this Ceprodel office to request a loan.  It will be used to remodel his home by building a porch to provide his family with more security.  He is grateful to Ceprodel for the opportunity.  With this loan he will buy construction materials like cement blocks, iron, cement, and sand.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Mónica Tatiana

texts.es:
La Señorita. Mónica es socia del banco comunal Fuerza Trabajadora, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones, también tienen una gran variedad en su gastronomía.
 
La Señorita. Mónica tiene 22 años, es madre soltera de una niña de 2 años de edad. Vive con sus padres, su papá es comerciante y su mamá labora en un restaurante de su propiedad, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.

Nuestra socia es estudiante de una universidad de la ciudad, en la cual cursa su primer año de enfermería y en sus tiempos libres ayuda a su mamá a trabajar en el negocio.
 
En el banco comunal se encuentra en su tercer crédito y lo va a invertir en víveres, vajilla y cubiertos para el restaurante de su mamá y así crecer en el negocio familiar.
 
Su meta es llegar a ser una gran profesional.
texts.en:
Monica, 22, is a member of the Fuerza Trabajadora community bank.  She lives on the outskirts of Cuenca, a city named a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its beautiful architecture.  Its people maintain the area's traditional culture and traditions and the local cuisine is known for its great variety.

Monica is a single mother with a 2-year old child.  She lives with her parents.  Her father is a retailer and her mother has a restaurant business.  The house where they live is rented.  

Monica is a first-year nursing student at a university in the city.  In her spare time, she works at her mother's restaurant.  

This is Monica's third loan as a member of the community bank.  She wants to invest in her mother's restaurant and she will use the loan to buy plates, dinnerware and other supplies for what is becoming the family business.

Monica's goal is a good career.

loans.use: to buy plates, dinnerware and other supplies for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Feliciano

texts.es: El señor: Feliciano convive con la señora: Eulalia con la cual tienen 2 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar y viven en la comunidad de quebrada portuguesa, comunidad distante a 4 kilómetros de la Guardia. Viven de la agricultura, a través de la siembra de sus productos: maíz, yuca, maní, frijol y verduras. Ellos lograron conseguir su parcela y desde hace 3 años y desde entonces se  que se dedican a la agricultura, el dinero del  credito lo utilizaran el lo que implica el preparado de la tierra la compra de semillas para la siembra de maiz,  trabaja junto a su esposa y después comercializan sus productos en el mercado de  la comunidad, el Sr. Feliciano es una persona muy trabajadora agradecido con la institución por el apoyo brindado. En la foto el Sr Feliciano esta en compañia de su esposa.
texts.en: Sr. Feliciano and Sra. Eulalia have two school-aged children.  They live in Quebrada Portuguesa, a rural community some 4 kilometers from La Guardia.  They make their living from farming, growing and selling crops such as maize, yucca, peanuts, beans and vegetables.  They got the farm 3 years ago and have been farming ever since.  They will use this loan to prepare land for their next maize crop.  Sr. Feliciano and Sra. Eulalia work the land together and sell their crops at local markets when the crops are ready for sale.  Sr. Feliciano is a hard-working man and he's grateful for the support he's received from the bank.  He and his wife are pictured together in the attached photo.

loans.use: to buy seeds for his maize farming business.

loans.name: Daniela Verónica

texts.es:
La Señorita. Daniela es socia del banco comunal Fuerza Trabajadora, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones, también tienen una gran variedad en su gastronomía. 

La Señorita. Daniela tiene 22 años de edad, es soltera y vive con sus padres quienes laboran como empleados privados, no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Nuestra socia se dedica a su negocio, ella tiene un restaurante hace 5 años, trabaja de lunes a sábados desde las 8 de la mañana hasta las 9 de la noche.
 
Se encuentra en su tercer ciclo en el banco comunal y su nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en sillas, mesas y víveres para ampliar su negocio.
 
Su meta es tener un local más grande para vender su comida.
texts.en:
Daniela, 22, is a member of the Fuerza Trabajadora community bank. She lives on the outskirts of Cuenca, a city named a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its beautiful architecture. Its people maintain the area's traditional culture and traditions and the local cuisine is known for its great variety.
 
Daniela is single and lives with her parents, both of whom have jobs.  The house where they live is rented. 

Daniela has owned a restaurant business for 5 years.  She works Mondays to Saturdays from 8:00 in the morning to 9:00 at night.   

This is Daniela's third loan as a member of the community bank. She will use it to buy tables, chairs and other supplies that she needs to expand her restaurant.
 
Daniela wants a larger space to operate her business.

loans.use: to buy table, chairs and other supplies for her restaurant business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Guillermina De Lourdes

texts.es:
La Señora. Guillermina es socia del banco comunal Fuerza Trabajadora, vive por los alrededores de la ciudad de Cuenca, ciudad que fue nombrada como patrimonio cultural de la humanidad por su belleza arquitectónica, su gente mantiene la cultura y tradiciones, también tienen una gran variedad en su gastronomía.
 
La Señora. Guillermina tiene 45 años, es casada y fruto de su unión conyugal ha concebido 3 hijos de 26, 23 y 15 años de edad, su primera hija trabaja y le ayuda  económicamente, su segunda hija ayuda en casa y su tercera hija estudia en un colegio de la ciudad. Su esposo labora como latonero (enderezado de latas de vehículos), no tienen casa propia por lo que viven arrendando.
 
Doña Guillermina es comerciante y se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de la marca Avon y Yanbal, esta actividad  la realiza hace 4 años y vende sus productos todos los días y sin un horario fijo.

Doña Guillermina va a invertir su crédito en la compra de cosméticos de las dos marcas.

Su meta es de llegar a ser una estrella en la venta de estos productos.
texts.en:
Guillermina, 45, is a member of the Fuerza Trabajadora community bank.  She lives on the outskirts of Cuenca, a city named a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its beautiful architecture.  The area's people maintain their culture and traditions and its cuisine is known for its great variety.

Guillermina is married and has 3 daughters, 26-, 23-, and 15-years old.  Her oldest daughter has a job and lives independently.  Her second daughter lives at home and helps out around the house.  Her youngest daughter is in high school.  Her husband is a "latonero" (an auto-body-shop worker).  The house where they live is rented.

Guillermina has owned a cosmetics sales business for 4 years.  She sells Avon and Yanbal products.  She works every day, with no fixed hours.  

Guillermina will use the loan to stock her business with Avon and Yanbal products.

Her goal is to be a star saleswoman.

loans.use: to buy Avon and Yanbal products for her cosmetics sales business.

loans.name: Claudia Cordelia

texts.es: Claudia Cordelia se dedica a una actividad a un cafetín. Tiene 18 años de tener este negocio. Claudia inicio cuando fue despedida de su trabajo y empezó a vender solo fresco fue poco a poco que logro crecer con su actividad, Aduce la señora que ha logrado progresar aun más, ya que siempre ha invertido los créditos para lo que solicita. El financiamiento que solicita es para la compra de pan, golosinas, refrescos, café, leche entre otros. Su sueño ahora es condicionar el local y hacerlo más grande.
texts.en: Claudia Cordelia has been running a coffee shop for 18 years.  She began her business when she was laid off from her job and started selling only refreshments.  Little by little she was able to expand and feels this was largely due to the loans she invested in it.  The loan she is requesting now is to buy bread, sweets, softdrinks, coffee and milk, among other items.  He dream is to make improvements in the location and make it larger.

loans.use: To buy bread, sweets, softdrinks, coffee, and milk among other items.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Juana Irene

texts.es: La señora  Juana es un cliente antiguo que trabaja con emprender desde el año 2007, actualmente tiene dos créditos  en la institución uno de inversión y otro para capital de trabajo, la señora se  dedica ala venta de verduras por mayor en uno de los mercados más populosos de la ciudad de la Paz y vive en la zona Indaburo. El crédito  invertirá para adelantar a sus proveedores de verduras ya que ellos le venden por mayor,  La cliente se siente  beneficiada al ser otorgado el crédito Kiva. Juana  tiene  gran visión para  los negocios y quiere superarse  y fortalecerse con su  negocio que es la venta de  verduras  por mayor.
texts.en: Mrs. Juana is past customer who has been an entrepreneur since 2007.  Se has had two loans through the institution, one for investment and the other for working capital.  She sells wholesale vegetables in one of the busiest markets in the city of La Paz and she lives in the Indaburo area.  She plans to use this credit to pay her suppliers for the vegetables they sell to her wholesale.  She is grateful for the Kiva loan.  Juana has a great business sense and a desire to get ahead and strengthen her vegetable business.

loans.use: To buy wholesale vegetables.

loans.name: Mario Roberto

texts.es:
En municipio de Managua, el señor Mario Roberto  se ha caracterizado por ser un trabajador, se desempeña como agente de seguridad y se dedica a esta labor desde hace cuatro años. Es acompañado y con cuatro personas a su cargo.

Actualmente ha acudido a ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para mejorar la condición de su vivienda en la compra de materiales de construcción y para pagar otra deuda pendiente con otra institución, por medio de esta obra brindarle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
In the town of Managua, Mr. Mario Roberto is well-known for his hard work in his job as a security agent.  He has worked in this job for four years.  He has a partner and four people in his care.

He has requested a loan through Ceprodel to buy construction materials for home improvement.  He also plans to pay back a pending debt with another institution, so he can improve his family's lifestyle.

loans.use: To buy construction materials.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal “Vamos Juntas” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco.  El lugar es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una D. las nuevas siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. 

En el lugar conocimos la señora Gloria, tiene 60 años D. edad y mantiene una relación D. unión libre D. la cual tiene tres hijos y nos cuenta:

“Nací en la ciudad D. Anta (Cusco, Perú), ahora vivo en la ciudad del Cusco y donD. desarrollo mi actividad económica que es vender comida, Yo preparó diferentes tipos D. platos D. comida como por ejemplo arroz con pollo, estofado, chicharrón y otros más, y me va muy bien”. 

Ya son 25 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Este crédito es para comprar 5 sacos D. arroz, 3 sacos D. azúcar y un lata D. aceite.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Vamos Juntas" meets every month in the city of Cusco.  This location is famous for its tourism and commercial activity as well as for the traditional Inti Raymi festivity.  One of the new Seven Wonders of the World, "Machupicchu", is also located here.

Mrs. Gloria, 60, has a common-law husband and three children.  She tells us:

"I was born in the city of Anta (Cusco, Perú) but now live in the city of Cusco where I have my food business.  I prepare different dishes such as chicken with rice, stew, pork rinds and others, and business is going well".

She has been in business for 25 years and her hard work has maD. it a success.  The loan will be used to buy five sacks of rice, three sacks of sugar and a can of oil.

loans.use: To buy five sacks of rice, three sacks of sugar and a can of oil.

loans.name: Karla Patricia

texts.es:
En municipio de Managua, la señora Karla Patricia  se ha caracterizado por ser una dama muy trabajadora y se desempeña como secretaria ejecutiva en una institución del estado, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace nueve años. Es soltero y con cuatro personas a su cargo que le proporciona las condiciones necesarias a su familia. 

La señora Karla Patricia  ha acudido a ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para mejorar la condición de su vivienda en la compra de materiales de construcción tale como zinc, perlines y pago de mano de obra, para cambiar el techo que se encuentra en mal estado en su vivienda, por medio de esta obra brindarle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Managua, Karla Patricia is known for being a very hardworking woman.  She works as an executive assistant in a state institution, which she has done for nine years now.  She is single and has four dependent family members for whom she provides all necessities.  

Karla Patricia has come to Ceprodel in order to ask for a loan to improve the condition of her home.  She plans to buy construction materials such as corrugated iron and roofing beams, and to pay for labor to replace the roof of her house, which is in bad shape.  This building work will allow her to offer her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Grupo Hatarinas Group

texts.es:
Epifanía es una mujer de 49 años de edad, ella pertenece a la alcancía Grupo Hatarinas con 7 miembros entre hombres y Mujeres, son personas emprendedoras, que actualmente todos tienen un negocio y un propósito en común para sostener a sus familiares, con sueños por alcanzar y lograr. Epifanía y su conviviente tiene un negocio de venta de platería y en sus ratos libres ella hace acabados en joyas es su mayor habilidad, tiene 3 hijos de los cuales 2 aun son menores de edad y que por ellos tiene que luchar para poder darles lo mejor, gracias al apoyo de  nuestra institución ha podido darles educación y construir su vivienda, con el ultimo préstamo piensa invertir en materiales de plata para trabajos nuevos.
El Señor David no estuvo presente en el desembolso del grupo por motivo de trabajo, por lo cual se incrementa la fotografia lado izquierda, con polo color blanco.
texts.en:
Epifanía is a 49-year-old woman who belongs to the Grupo Hatarinas Communal Bank, which has seven male and female members.  They are enterprising people who all currently have their own businesses, a common goal of supporting their families, and dreams to reach for and attain.

 Epifanía and her live-in partner have a business selling silver and, in her free time, she finishes jewelry, which is her greatest skill.  She has three children, two of whom are still minors.  It is for them that she has to struggle to be able to give them the best, and thanks to the help of this institution, she has been able to give them an education and to build their home.  With this latest loan she plans to invest in silver for new work projects.

David was not present for the group disbursement , which is why he appears in the photograph on the left hand side wearing a white shirt.

loans.use: to invest in silver.

loans.name: Maria Concepcion

texts.en: Maria lives in Choluteca, Honduras with her husband. Together they run a small brick-making business, waking at 5 a.m. each morning to begin the workday. Maria is requesting a loan of HNL 10,000 to purchase firewood (which is used in firing the bricks) and to pay employees. In her spare time Maria raises chickens at home.

loans.use: to purchase firewood and pay employees.

loans.name: Julio Cesar

texts.es:
En municipio de Managua, el señor Julio Cesar  se dedica   a laborar como responsable de bodega  en una institución del estado, dedicándose a esta labor desde hace diecinueve años. Es casado y con cuatro personas a su cargo que le proporciona las condiciones necesarias a su familia. 

El señor Julio cesar ha acudido a ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para mejorar la condición de su vivienda en la compra de materiales de construcción tale como bloque, cemento, arena, y pago de mano de obra, para levantar  muro  para darle seguridad a su vivienda, por medio de esta obra brindarle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Señor Julio Cesar has been working for a state institution in a warehouse in the city of Managua for nineteen years.  He is married and has four dependents that he provides for.  

Señor Julio Cesar is requesting a loan through Ceprodel to make improvements to his house.  He will use the loan to buy construction materials such as bricks, cement, and sand and to pay for manual labor to construct a wall that will give his home better security.  This will improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: purchase construction materials.

loans.name: Maria Calixta

texts.es: La señora Maria Calixta tiene 52 años, ella es casada. Maria tiene su negocio que es la venta de frijoles cosidos, gaseosas y leña, cabe señalar tiene 21 años de tener este negocio y también posee una clientela ya establecida en su comarca. La mayoría de sus ventas son al contado, sin embargo también realiza ventas a crédito, para algunos clientes que son fijos. Este negocio nació por la necesidad de incrementar los ingresos familiares, para mejorar económicamente. Ella desea invertir este crédito en la compra de frijoles, leña y gaseosas. Su sueño es tener otro medio de ingreso para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Maria Calixta is 52 years old and married. Her business is selling cooked beans, sodas and firewood. She has been doing this for 21 years and has a well-established clientele in her neighborhood. The majority of her sales are in cash, but she also sells on credit for some of her regular customers. The business was born out of the need to bring more income into the family to improve financially. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of beans, firewood and sodas. Her dream is to have another form of income to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy beans, firewood and sodas.

loans.name: Wenceslao

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Wenceslao; el tiene 32 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 2 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de ropa, el socio junto con su esposa tienen el negocio de venta de ropa donde venden blusas, polos y pantalones y el socio también se dedica al negocio de transporte, el realiza servicio de taxi desde las 5:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este trabajo de transporte y negocio de venta de ropa el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar el negocio de transporte y también mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar ropa como pantalones, blusas, chompas y polos y también para el mantenimiento de su carro para comprar repuestos para el carro.
                                               
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MANOS JUNTAS” communal bank.  The bank is located in Cusco district, part of Cusco province and department.

This member is Sr. Wenceslao, who is 32 years old.  He lives with his partner and has two children.  He alternates his daily activities between his business buying and selling clothes, which he runs with his wife and where they sell blouses, polo shirts and pants, and his transportation business: he offers taxi services from 5 a.m. until 10 p.m. Through his work as a taxi driver and his business selling clothes, Sr. Wenceslao is helping his children get ahead. He wants to expand his taxi service and also his business buying and selling clothes. He requests a loan to buy clothing such as pants, blouses, sweaters and polo shirts and also to maintain his car through the purchase of needed spare parts.

Sr. Wenceslao is happy about the loan and is committed to making his loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy clothing such as pants, blouses, sweaters and polo shirts and also to maintain his car through the purchase of needed spare parts..

loans.name: Nancy Yessenia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Nancy Yessenia; ella tiene 36 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, la socia vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz,azúcar,mantequilla,galletas y fideos, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio de tienda de abarrotes la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para implementar la tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, mantequillas, fideos y galletas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Nancy belongs to the “Manos Juntas” (Hands Together) Communal Bank, located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

Nancy is 36 years old, single, and has 2 children. Her daily activities include running her grocery store, which sells products of primary necessity such as rice, sugar, butter, cookies, and beans. Nancy works from 6:00 am until 10:00 pm. By means of this grocery store, Nancy advances her children.

She wants to expand and improve her grocery store business. Nancy is requesting a loan to implement her plans, buying products such as rice, sugar, butter, beans, and cookies.

Nancy is happy about the loan and promises to comply with her payment schedule.

loans.use: to buy products to stock her grocery store, such as rice, sugar, butter, beans, and cookies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to repair a room of his house, and increase his family's security.

loans.name: Angelica

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco,  y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Angelica; ella tiene 54 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. mistura que es hecho D. papel D. colores que se utiliza para fiestas, bautizos y matrimonios, la socia también se dedica al negocio D. tienda D. abarrotes, ella trabaja desD. las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar e implementar el negocio D. mistura y tienda D. abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mistura al por mayor y comprar productos D. primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos y leche.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank "Manos Juntas (Hands Together)."  The bank is located in the district of Cusco, which belongs to the province of Cusco, and department of Cusco.

The member is Ms. Angelica, she is 54 years old and married with 2 children.  She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling mistura, a material that is maD. of colored paper that is used for parties, christenings and marriages, and she also works in the grocery business.   She works from 6:00 am to 10:00 pm.   Angelica wants to expand and improve her business of mistura and the grocery store.  She is requesting the loan to buy mistura wholesale and buy staples such as rice, sugar, noodles and milk.

Angelica is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the payment of her quota.

loans.use: to buy misturas(colored papers) wholesale and staples such as rice, sugar, noodles and milk.

loans.name: Cayetana Del Rosario

texts.es: La señora Cayetana tiene 57 años su actividad es la compra y venta de ropa nueva.  Este negocio surgió como su principal fuente de ingresos, ella es una persona muy responsable. Esta no es la primera vez que realiza financiamientos, por lo que han sido de buena ayuda.  Actualmente sigue adelante con este negocio pues es el único medio de vida que posee, pues tiene que cuidar de su actividad. El financiamiento es para invertir en su negocio y ofrecer una gran variedad de productos como pantalones, camisas, faldas, vestidos, trajes y faldas. Sueña con mejorar su actividad todos los días.
texts.en: Cayetana is 57 years old. Her activity is buying and selling new clothing. This business has become her main source of income. She is a very responsible person. This is not the first time that she has taken out a loan and they have been a great help. At present, she is going to keep on doing this business since it is the only way of earning a living that she has and she has to take care of her activity. The loan is to invest in her business and offer a wide variety of products such as pants, shirts, dresses, suits and skirts. She dreams of improving her activity everyday.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts, suits and dresses.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials to improve his house, providing his family greater security.

loans.name: Isabel

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Isabel; ella tiene 37 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, su esposo trabaja con su carro haciendo servicio de taxi en las diferentes calles de la ciudad de Cusco, y la socia es ama de casa, ella cocina para sus hijos y esposo, la socia quiere mejorar en el servicio de taxi. La socia solicita el préstamo para el mantenimiento de su carro, para comprar repuestos para su carro.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MANOS JUNTAS” ´Hands Together`community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.

Her name is Isabel. She is 37 years old, married and has 3 children. She alternates her daily activities with the transportation business. Her husband works with his car, offering taxi service on different streets in Cuzco. Isabel is a housewife who cooks for her children and husband. She wants to improve the taxi service. She is asking for the loan for car maintenance and to buy replacement parts.

Isabel is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her car and buy replacement parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy medicine and pay for his mother's doctors visits.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Cirila; ella tiene 59 años de edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción, ella vende cemento, ladrillos, clavos, pinturas entre otros materiales de construcción socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de materiales de construcción. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cemento, yeso, arena y pinturas al por mayor.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “MANOS JUNTAS” [Hands Together] community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco. 

Her name is Cirila. She is 59 years old, married and has 3 children. She sells construction materials. She sells cement, bricks, nails, and paints, among other construction materials. She works from 8:00 a.m until 9:00 p.m. With this business she gets her children ahead. Cirila would like to grow her business selling construction materials. She is asking for the loan to buy cement, plaster, sand and paints wholesale.   

She is happy with the loan and committed to making the payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, plaster, sand and paints wholesale.

loans.name: Libia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Libia, la socia tiene 66 años D. edad, la socia tiene 3 hijos D. 42, 40, 36 años D. edad; la socia es casada y ella se dedica desD. hace 40 años a la compra y venta D. autopartes es un negocio hereditario, sus padres y los padres D. estos formaron el negocio que con las generaciones que se vinieron se hizo un negocio familiar;  La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. repuestos D. autopartes que la socia hace pedidos para implementar su tienda D. venta D. autopartes. La socia requiere el préstamo para comprar repuestos (autopartes) e implementar su negocio.

 La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the “MARIA ELENA MOYANO” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac, province of Cusco, in the Department of Cusco.

Her name is Libia, and she is 66 years old. She has 3 children, aged 42, 40, and 36. She is married, and for the past 40 years, she has worked buying and selling auto parts. It is an inherited family business; her parents and their parents befO. them built up the business, and over the generations it became a family business. The borrower is requesting the loan to invest in ordering additional auto parts to stock her auto parts business. She needs the loan to buy spare parts (auto parts) and stock her business. 

The borrower is grateful for the support provided to her, and accordingly she is committed to fulfilling her payment schedule in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy auto parts and stock her business.

loans.name: Wendy Noelia

texts.es: La Señora Wendy tiene 28 años. Es madre soltera y tiene 1 hijo a su cargo. La actividad económica es la venta de mercadería ropa. Hace más de 5 años que posee este negocio. La ubicación de su negocio es de manera ambulante, poco a poco fue incrementando su inventario con las pocas ganancias que su negocio le generaba, sus clientes recurrían a su negocio ya que la atención  de Wendy es muy buena y además atiende a sus clientes con una sonrisa en sus labios. El financiamiento que solicita es para capital de trabajo y comprar pantalones, camisas, trajes para salir, ropa en general y ropa interior. Su mayor sueño es que su hijo logre finalizar sus estudios y que siga adelante con esta actividad.
texts.en:
Ms. Wendy is 28 years old. She is a single mother and has one child in her care. Her income-generating activity is the selling of clothes, a business she has had for more than five years. The location of her business is as a street vendor. Little by little she increased her inventory with the small profit her business generated. Her customers turned to her business because Wendy provides very good customer service, and furthermore she waits on her customers with a smile on her lips. 

The loan she is requesting is for working capital and to purchase pants, shirts, dressy apparel, clothes in general and undergarments. Her greatest dream is that her son would successfully complete his studies and that she would continue on in this business.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, dressy apparel, clothes in general and undergarments.

loans.name: Dayci

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MANOS JUNTAS”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Dayci; ella tiene 29 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de ropa, ella vende pantalones, blusas, polos, chompas y casacas para mujeres, ella trabaja desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de ropa. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar mercadería como pantalones, chompas, blusas y polos para el negocio de venta de ropa.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Manos Juntas [Hands Together] located in the district of Cusco belonging to the province and department of Cusco. 

The member is Mrs. Dayci, 29, who is married and has two children. The member alternates her daily activities with a clothing sales business. She sells pants, blouses, polo shirts, sweaters and ladies' jackets. She works from 9 a.m. until 9 p.m. By means of this business the member gets her children ahead. The member wants to expand and improve her clothing sales business. The member is seeking the loan to purchase merchandise such as pants, sweaters, blouses and polo shirts for her clothing sales business. 

The member is happy to receive the loan and promises to comply with the payment plan.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise such as pants, sweaters, blouses and polo shirts for her clothing sales business.

loans.name: Valentina

texts.en:
Valentina is 59 years old and married with six children. Five of her children live separately from her in Bolivia while one child still lives with her while finishing university. Valentina is the owner of a small convenience store that sells a variety of basic necessities. Additionally, she is very active in her community, planning events and organizing other activities. 

Valentina is asking for a loan in order to pay for the university of her daughter who is living in Bolivia. She wants her daughter to get a strong education so that she can become a professional like her other children. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to pay her daughter's university tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase basic food staples, canned goods, detergents, toilet paper, drinks and bread.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha T. is 77 years old and widowed. She has five children, one of whom still lives with her in her house. She works in agriculture and is the owner of a small farm, which is located up the hill from her house. She mainly produces corn to sell and sometimes other vegetables for her own consumption. She is asking for a $1,200 loan to purchase a new tractor and corn seeds. Martha is a very hardworking woman and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase a tractor and corn seeds

loans.name: Zonia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Huanchac en la Provincia D. Cusco y Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zonia, La socia tiene 48 años D. edad, la socia tiene 2 hijos D. 29 y 27 años D. edad, la socia tiene 2 locales D. bar restaurante, la socia se dedica  a la administración D. sus bar restaurantes, ella es muy buena en este negocio y ha puesto la segunda sucursal hace 2 años a tras y ahora esta tras D. la tercera, la socia tiene dos locales actualmente implementados y el tercero esta en arriendo y en el mes D. septiembre le entregaran el tercero para esto ella deberá tener dinero para implementar el nuevo bar restaurante. La socia también se dedica a la compra y venD. antigüedades como cuadros, muebles mesas, sillas, entre otras antigüedades. La socia solicita el crédito para implementar su negocio con la compra D. pintura, ceras, platos, vasos, copas, cubiertos, mesas, sillas. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. muebles y menajería para implementar su negocio D. bar restaurante.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank Maria Elena Moyano, located in the district of Huanchac in the province and department of Cusco. 

The member is Mrs. Zonia, 48, who has two children who are 29 and 27 years of age. The member has two restaurant-bar locations, and earns a living managing her restaurant-bars. She is very good at this business and set up the second location two years ago, and is now working on the third. The member has two restaurants already up and running, and the third is being rented out. In the month of September they will hand over the third to her, so she will need to have money to set up the new restaurant-bar. The member also buys and sells antiques such as paintings, furniture, tables, and chairs among other antiques. The member is seeking the loan to start up her business with the purchase of paint, candles, plates, cups, wine glasses, table clothes, tables and chairs. The member is seeking the loan to invest in the purchase of furniture and table settings for setting up her restaurant-bar business. 

The member appreciates the support to be given her, and thus promises to make her payments in a disciplined way.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of furniture and table settings for starting up a restaurant-bar business.

loans.name: Celia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Celia; ella tiene 28 años de edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de transporte, ella realiza movilidad escolar, ella trabaja desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 2:00 p.m, por medio de este trabajo la socia quiere sacar adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere mejorar el servicio de movilidad escolar. La socia solicita el préstamo para mantenimiento de su carro y también para pagar la mensualidad de educación de su hijo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the “SANTO DOMINGO” community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cuzco, which belongs to the province and department of Cuzco.

Her name is Celia. She is 28 years old, single, and has 1 son. She works in the transportation business, bringing children to and from school. She works from 7:00 a.m. to 2:00 p.m. Celia wants to get her son ahead with this job and she wants to improver her transportation service. She is asking for the loan to do maintenance o her car and also to pay for her son's monthly tuition.  

She is happy with the loan and committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her car and also to pay for her son's monthly tuition.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay construction costs such as metal sheeting, purlins and labor.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy supplies for planting his crops

loans.name: Ana Francisca

texts.es:
El Banco Comunal “Vamos Juntas” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Cusco.  El lugar es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las nuevas siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”. 

En el lugar conocimos la señora Ana, tiene 25 años de edad y tiene un hijo, y nos cuenta:

“Nací en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú), vivo en la misma ciudad donde nací y donde trabajo en un laboratorio dental, Yo soy técnica en odontología y trabajo ayudando a elaborar prótesis dentales pero también en mi domicilio en mis horas libres elaboro prótesis para el mismo laboratorio. Tengo algunas máquinas, herramientas y materiales para hacer mis productos”. 

Desde los 18 años que se dedica a este negocio y le va  muy bien gracias al empeño que pone en su trabajo. Este crédito es para comprar materiales acrílicos.
texts.en:
The “Vamos Juntas” ["Come Together"] communal bank meets every 30 days in the city of Cusco. This area is known for being very touristy and commercial, for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and because it is where you can find one of the new seven Wonders of the World, Machu Picchu. 

This is where Asociación Arariwa met Ms. Ana, who is 25 years old and has one son. She tells Asociación Arariwa:

"I was born in the city of Cusco (Peru) and I live in the same city where I was born. I also work here in a dental laboratory. I am a dental technician and I work helping to make dental prostheses. I also work at my house in my free time to make dental prostheses for the same laboratory. I have various machines, tools, and materials to make my products."

Ana has been working in this business since she was 18 years old and it is going very well thanks to the effort she puts into her work. This loan is for buying acrylic materials.

loans.use: to buy acrylic materials for making dental prostheses

loans.name: Francisca

texts.es:
L. socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a L. provincia D. Cusco,  y departamento D. Cusco.

L. socia es L. Sra. Francisca; elL. tiene 43 años D. edad y es soltera y tiene 1 hijo; L. socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. venta D. aretes, collares y pulseras, elL. venD. en forma ambulatoria desD. las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,L. socia realiza los aretes, pulseras y collares, por medio D. este negocio L. socia saca adelante a sus hijos, L. socia quiere ampliar el negocio D. venta D. bisutería y también quiere que su hijo termine D. estudiar L. carrera profesional D. biología. L. socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer los aretes, collares y pulseras y también para pagar L. mensualidad D. su hijo que estudia en L. universidad.

 L. socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Francisca. She is 43 years old, single, and has one son. She divides her time between her daily activities and her business selling earrings, necklaces and bracelets. She sells in an ambulatory manner from 9:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. She makes the earrings, bracelets and necklaces herself. This business has been the means by which she has helped her son to get ahead. She would now like to expand her jewelery sales business and would also like for her son to be able to finish his professional studies in the field of biology. She is requesting this loan to buy materials for making earrings, necklaces and bracelets, and also to pay her son's monthly tuition for attending the university.

Francisca is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy materials for making earrings, necklaces and bracelets, and also to pay her son's monthly university tuition

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en: Margarita is 47 years old and married with four children. She has a small stand in the local market in her town where she sells bread every day of the week. She bakes all of her own bread fresh daily and is especially known for her sweet bread. She is asking for a $1,200 loan in order to build a new oven in the kitchen of her house. Currently, she must rent an oven outside of her house to make bread and a new oven will save her time and money in the long run. Specifically, she will buy cement, wood, and other materials to build her oven. Margarita is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy cement, wood, and other materials to build a large oven in her house

loans.name: María Gumercinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. María Gumercinda; ella tiene 75 años de edad y es viuda y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de artesanías, el hace muñequitas de artesanía y también hace llaveros y  luego los vende en la feria de San Blas en forma ambulatoria desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de artesanía. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar materiales para hacer las muñequitas como tela, lana, pinturas y agujas.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank, which is located in the district, province and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. María Gumercinda. She is 75 years old, widowed, and has one son. She divides her time between her daily activities and a business selling crafts. She makes dolls and key chains and then sells them in an ambulatory fashion at the San Blas fair. She sells from 8:00 a.m. until 5:00 p.m. This business has been the means by which she has helped her son to get ahead. She would like to expand her business of selling crafts. She is requesting a loan to buy materials for making her dolls, such as fabric, wool, paint and needles. 

María is very happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy doll-making supplies, such as fabric, wool, paint and needles

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy beams and corrugated metal roofing

loans.name: Juana

texts.en: Juana is 56 years old and married with two children. Both children are currently students. Her occupation is raising animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs that she eventually sells. She has a large pen next to her house where she keeps the animals. Every four or five months she sells the animals that she has raised and then purchases new ones. She is asking for a $600 loan to purchase more animals such as guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs and to buy food for them. Juana is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase guinea pigs, chickens, and pigs and food for them

loans.name: Zenovia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “SANTO DOMINGO”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito D. Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia D. Cusco,  y departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Zenovia; ella tiene 52 años D. edad y es casada y tiene 3 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio D. restaurant, ella venD. desayunos, almuerzos y cenas, ella prepara platos como estofado D. pollo, rocoto relleno, lomo saltado entre otros platos, la socia trabaja desD. las 4:00 a.m hasta las 9:00 p.m, por medio D. este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar la atención D. negocio D. restaurant. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos para cocinar como arroz, aceite, pollos, carnes y verduras.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos D. su cuota.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the "Santo Domingo" communal bank, which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco.

This borrower is Ms. Zenovia. She is 52 years old, married and has three children. She divides her time between her daily activities and running her restaurant business. She sells breakfast, lunch and dinner. She prepares foods like chicken stew, stuffed peppers, beef stir-fry and other dishes. Zenovia works from 4:00 a.m. until 9:00 p.m. This business has been the means by which she has helped her children to get ahead. She would like to expand and improve the service at her restaurant. She is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for cooking such as rice, oil, chicken, meat and vegetables.

Zenovia is happy to receive this loan and promises to comply with her repayment schedule.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for cooking such as rice, oil, chicken, meat and vegetables

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Yngrid

texts.en: Yngrid is 28 years old and lives with her boyfriend. She works in a small hostel called Jamanga in the city of Calca, outside of Cusco city. Depending on the day, she works as either a cook or she cleans the common areas and rooms of the hostel. She is asking for a 1,000 dollar loan in order to invest in her mother's bread baking business. Her mother makes her bread herself and then sells it in the local market in Calca. Yngrid plans to purchase flour, sugar, and eggs for her mother. She is committed to making the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, and eggs for her mother's bread-baking business.

loans.name: Adolfo Antonio

texts.es: Adolfo Antonio tiene 31 años, su actividad económica es la compra y venta de ganado. Esta actividad es muy popular en nuestro país, pues la mayoría de las personas tienen este medio de vida para sobrevivir. Hace más de 8 años, que se dedica a este negocio cuando dio inicio fue por su familia, fue así que Adolfo aprendió de este negocio debido a la necesidad de sufragar los gastos de su hogar. El solicita este financiamiento para la compra de vacas, terneros y toros.
texts.en: Adolfo Antonio is 31 years old. He makes a living buying and selling cattle. This type of work is very popular in his country, as it is the way of life for the majority of people. Adolfo Antonio has been in this business for over eight years. He started because of his family and learned this business because of the need to cover his household expenses. He is requesting this loan to buy cows, calves and bulls.

loans.use: to buy cows, calves and bulls

loans.name: Marcela

texts.es: Marcela es comerciante ya que tiene una pequeña pulpería donde vende los granos básicos y también una venta de cosméticos tales como lociones, shampoo, cremas para el cuerpo y otros.Ella es soltera y vive junto a dos nietas. Es importante destacar que ha utilizado creditos los cuales los ha invertido en su venta. El crédito que está solicitando es para la compra de los granos básicos como arroz, azucar y frijoles para la venta y de igual manera la compra de los cosméticos como lociones, cremas y shampoo. Sus nietas le ayudan a atender el negocio después que llegan de la escuela.
texts.en: Marcela is a businesswoman who has a pulpería [small grocery store] where she sells basic grains and cosmetics such as lotions, shampoo, body cremes and other products. She is single and her two granddaughters live with her. She has benefited from prior loans, which she has invested in her business. The current loan that she is requesting is to purchase basic grains such as rice, sugar and beans to sell, and also to buy cosmetics such as lotions, cremes and shampoo. Her granddaughters help her tend to the business after then arrive home from school.

loans.use: to buy basic grains like rice and beans, sugar, body lotion and shampoo.

loans.name: Sorayda

texts.en: Sorayda is 50 years old and married with three children who live separately from her. She is the owner of a store in which she sells a wide variety of different necessities for raising animals and farming. Her merchandise includes food for rats, chickens, cows, and cats, various antibiotics for animals, different sizes of cages, insecticides, and ammonium phosphate. Her business is fairly new as she has only had it for two years. Before that she owned a small grocery store. Sorayda is asking for a 1,000 dollar loan in order to add to the merchandise she sells in her store. She is very proud of her store and desires to continue to improve it. She is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more feed for animals, various antibiotics for animals, insecticides, and ammonium phosphate for her veterinary store.

loans.name: Yosip

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “MARIA ELENA MOYANO”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Huanchac en la Provincia de Cusco y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Yosip; el socio tiene  31 años de edad; el socio tiene 1 hijo de 8 años de edad,  el socio es soltero y el socio  es guía de turismo de profesión desde hace 5 años atrás y siempre que puede implementa su tienda de alquiler de  equipo  turístico,  el socio compra carpas,  matras, zapatillas, ponchos, sleeping,  el socio  alquila equipo de camping para los trekking, y también compra  para implementar  la cocina con  sillas, mesas, platos y el socio apertura su tienda de alquiler de camping. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de equipo para alquilar.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
This borrower belongs to the “MARIA ELENA MOYANO” communal bank. The bank is located in the district of Huanchac, province of Cusco, in the Department of Cusco.

His name is Yosip, and he is 31 years old. He has one 8-year-old son. He is single, and he has worked as a tourist guide for 5 years. In addition, whenever he can, he stocks his store renting equipment to tourists. He buys tents, camping mattresses, sport shoes, ponchos and sleeping bags. He rents camping equipment for trekking, and he also buys items to stock the kitchen, such as chairs, tables and plates. He has opened a store to rent camping equipment. The borrower is requesting a loan to invest in buying equipment to rent out. 

The borrower is grateful for the support that will be provided to him, and accordingly, he is committed to fulfilling his payment schedule in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying equipment to rent.

loans.name: Dominga

texts.en:
Dominga is 52 years old and separated from her husband. She has one daughter who lives separately from her. Her occupation is selling clothes, specifically women's undergarments. She sells a wide variety of underwear and brassieres and also some pajamas. She sells her merchandise in a large market in the city of Quillabamba. 

Dominga has had this business for over ten years and is asking for a loan in order to buy more merchandise. Dominga is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy undergarments to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy construction materials for expanding his kitchen

loans.name: Miriam Gladis

texts.en:
Miriam Gladis is 47 years old and married with two children. Her son is 20 years old and her daughter is 10 years old. She has a small cafe in the university located in the city of Calca. She sells breakfast, lunch, and dinner five days a week at her cafe. In addition, she has a business selling corn and some clothing from her house on Saturdays and Sundays. 

Miriam is asking for a 1,000 dollar loan mainly to buy more corn to sell on the weekends. She also plans to use a small portion of the money to buy ingredients for her cafe such as potatoes, chicken, and beef. She is a very hard-working woman and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to buy more corn to sell.

loans.name: Algarrobos (Portoviejo) Group

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal Los Algarrobos se reúne cada quince días en Los Bajos del Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla. 

Este es un grupo de personas que hace un tiempo atrás decidieron unirse y formar este Banco Comunal que les sirve de mucho ya que con los créditos han podido mejorar el nivel de vida y ayudarse a financiar sus negocios, la mayoría de las personas que integran este banco se dedican a realizar trabajos de artesanía, cría de animales, venta de comida y comercio en general.

Una de las integrantes del grupo es la señora Karen, tiene 33 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos de 11, 10 y 5 años de edad que estudian en escuela. Su esposo es comerciante.

Nuestra amiga trabaja en el Municipio en Montecristi y realiza el crédito para el negocio del esposo el mismo que se dedica a la venta de batidos de frutas, alitas azadas y chuzos (carne en palito), esto lo realiza de lunes a jueves ya que los fines de semana también vende meriendas, lleva en este negocio seis meses y todo lo que prepara lo vende muy bien. 

Este crédito es para comprar 1 mesa, 6 sillas y víveres para preparar los alimentos. Este es el tercer ciclo en el Banco Comunal y le gusta porque los pagos son fáciles de hacer. 

Sus sueños son tener un carro.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Los Algarrobos" meets every 15 days in Los Bajos in the canton of Montecristi.  This area is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and its handicrafts, which are known at the national and international level, because this is the place where the famous Panama hats are made.

This is a group of people who sometime ago decided to unite and form this communal bank.  This served them well, because with the loans, they have been able to increase their standard of living and help finance their businesses.  Most of the members of this bank work in handicrafts, livestock, food production, and general retail trade.

One of the members of this group is Karen, 33, who is married and has 3 children aged 11,10 and 5.  Her children are in school and her husband is a merchant.

Our friend works in the municipality of Montecristi, and is taking the loan to use in her husband's business.  He sells fruit smoothies, grilled chicken wings and meat kebabs.  He sells these items from Monday through Thursday, because on the weekends he also sells snacks.  He has had this business for 6 months and everything he prepares sells very well.

This loan will be used to buy 1 table, 6 chairs and vegetables to use in preparing the food.  This is Karen's 3rd loan cycle in the communal bank, and she likes it because the payments are easy to make.

She dreams of having a car.

loans.use: to buy a table, 6 chairs and vegetables

loans.name: Maria Eugenia

texts.es:
En municipio de Managua, la señora Maria Eugenia se dedica arduamente a laborar como secretaria de oficinay se dedica a esta labor desde hace sietes años. Es soltera, tiene a su cargo tres hijos.

Actualmente ha acudido a ceprodel con el fin de solicitar un crédito para pagar gasto de consumo de energia y recibo de agua y saldar otra deuda de prestamo, por medio de esta obra brindarle mejor condición de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Maria Eugenia works arduously as an office secretary in the Managua municipality.  She has been doing this for seven years.  She is single, and she has three children under her care.

She has now come to Ceprodel to request a loan to pay for electricity expenses, the water bill, and another debt from a loan.  This will give her family better living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for some personal expenses.

loans.name: Enrique Tomás

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive don Enrique, el tiene 49 años de edad, está casado y fruto de esta relación tiene cuatro hijos, dos de ellos ya mayores y dos de 16  y 14 que  estudian en colegio. Su esposa es ama de casa. 

Nuestro amigo se dedica a la venta de pescado para lo cual el viaja tres veces a la semana hasta las ciudades de Guayaquil y Quito, de madrugada se desplaza hasta la ciudad de Manta a comprar el pescado para luego embarcarlo en un carro que alquila para llevar este delicioso producto del mar a las ciudades antes mencionadas, trabaja solo y en ciertas ocasiones su esposa le acompaña, lleva realizando esta actividad por más de 30 años y le ha ido muy bien.
 
Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar pescado. Está en el Banco Comunal desde hace 5 ciclos  y le gusta por los beneficios que brinda la institución. 

Sus sueños son comprar un carro propio para no pagar el alquiler que se le lleva gran parte de sus ganancias.
texts.en:
The María Monserrate Communal Bank meets every two weeks in the Montecristi canton.  It is known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its handicrafts, which are recognized on a national and international level.  The famous Panama hats are from this place.

Engrique, age 49, lives here.  He is married and has four children.  Two of them are grown. The other two are 16 and 14 years old, and they go to school.  His wife is a housewife.

Our friend sells fish.  In order to do so he travels three times a week to the cities of Guayaquil and Quito.  In the early morning he goes to the city of Manta to buy fish.  He then loads up the car that he rents to take this delicious product from the sea to the cities previously mentioned.  He works alone, and sometimes his wife accompanies him.  He has been doing this business activity for over 30 years, and it has gone very well for him.

He will use this loan to buy fish.  He has been in the communal bank for five cycles.  He likes it because of the benefits the institution offers.

His dream is to buy his own car so that he will not have to pay rent.  The rent takes a good part of his income.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Rosa Cristina

texts.es:
EL Banco Comunal María Monserrate se reúne cada quince días en el Cantón Montecristi, conocido por su rica cultura pre colonial y por su artesanía que es reconocida a nivel nacional e internacional. Lugar de los famosos sombreros de paja toquilla.

En este lugar vive La señora Rosa, tiene 47 años de edad, es solera y tiene dos hijos de 16 y 13 años que estudian en colegio, ella vive en la casa de sus padres.

Para obtener sus propios recursos y así sacar adelante a sus hijos ella junto  a su hermana tienen un negocio que es  compra y venta de pescado, ella y su hermana cuatro veces a la semana se van hasta la ciudad de Guayaquil a distribuir sus productos los mismos que los comprar en las playas de Manta, llevan en este negocio 16 años y les ha ido muy bien. Está muy agradecida con la Fundación Espoir porque gracias a los créditos ella ha podido salir adelante en su negocio.

Este crédito lo va a invertir en comprar pescado. Está en el Banco Comunal  desde el inicio  y le gusta porque con los créditos ha podido sacar adelante  a sus hijos.
 
Sus sueños son seguir adelante en su negocio.
texts.en:
The “María Monserrate” communal bank meets every two weeks in Montecristi Canton known for its rich pre-colonial culture and for its crafts which are famous both nationally and internationally; it is where the famous “Panama” straw hats come from.

Rosa, 47, lives here.  She’s single and has two children who are 16 and 13 years old; both go to school.  She lives in her parents’ house.

To earn her own resources and thus support her children she and her sister have a business selling fish.  She and her sister go all the way to the city of Guayaquil four times a week to sell their products that they purchase at the beaches in Manta.  They’ve been in business 16 years and have done very well.  She is very grateful to Fundación Espoir because thanks to the loans she’s been able to succeed in her business.

This loan will be invested in the purchase of fish.  She’s been in the communal bank since its beginning and she likes it because she’s been able to move her children forward thanks to the loans.  Her dream is to stay in business.

loans.use: to buy fish.

loans.name: Gloria Elizabeth

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Mi Banquito.

La señora Gloria es socia fundadora del Banco comunal y le gusta la facilidad para conseguir los créditos y por la ayuda que recibe.  Tiene 32 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene un  hijo de 5 años de edad que este año empezó a estudiar en  escuela. Su esposo es artesano.

Ella para ayudar a sus esposo con los gastos del hogar que son muchos hace 7 años se dedica a la venta productos por catálogos de Avon, Yanbal (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja tres días a la semana más que todo en las mañanas ya que es más fresco, su forma de venta es puerta a puerta y bajo pedido, deja a crédito y cobra semanalmente.  Lo que más vende son los perfumes ya que son muy buenos y de aroma agradable.

Este crédito lo va a emplear en comprar perfumes, bisutería, cosméticos y cremas.
 
Sus sueños son darle a su hijo lo mejor y que a él nunca le falte nada.
texts.en:
Los Bajos de Montecristi is a city known for its great diversity of traditional products. These include toquilla straw hats (also known as Panama hats), which are famous both inside and outside the country. The members of the Mi Banquito communal bank in that city meet every 15 days.  Gloria is a founding member of the communal bank, and she likes that she can get loans easily and receive help.

She is 32 years old, married, and has a 5 year-old son who began school this year. Her husband is a craftsman. In order to help her husband with household expenses (which are many), she has for 7 years sold products from the Avon and Yanbal catalogues (beauty products, cosmetics, perfume and  women's accessories).  She works three days a week, mostly in the mornings, since it is cooler then.  She sells door-to-door and also fills orders.  She sells on credit and collects payment weekly. Perfumes are what she sells the most, since they are very good and have a nice smell.  She will use this loan to buy perfumes, jewellery, cosmetics and creams. 

Her dream is to provide the best life she can for her son, so that he never lacks anything.

loans.use: To buy perfume, jewellery, cosmetics and creams

loans.name: Aurea

texts.en:
Aurea is 59 years old and lives in Dipolog City. She is married with two children. 

To earn a living, Aurea has a business selling snacks. She earns about PHP 2000 each month doing this type of work. Aurea has a requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to purchase raw ingredients for snack vending.

Aurea has been a member of PMPC for five years.

loans.use: to purchase raw ingredients for snack vending.

loans.name: Carmen Lucciola

texts.es:
En Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su gran diversidad de productos típicos, como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país se reúnen cada 15  días las socias del Banco Comunal Mi Banquito.

La señora Carmen es socia fundadora del banco comunal y le gusta la ayuda que siempre le dan con los créditos. Tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tiene tres hijos, uno de ellos ya es mayor de edad y dos de 16 y 4 años, uno  estudia en, colegio. Su esposo es comerciante.

Ella es una muy buena ama de casa que para ayudar a su esposo en los gastos del hogar realiza el crédito para que él pueda financiar su negocio, él se dedica a la venta de granos como por ejemplo frejol, lentejas, maní, entre otros, trabaja cuatro días a la semana en el mercado de Manta, lleva 15 años que se dedica a esta actividad  y gracias a Dios esto le ha dado para salir adelante.

Este crédito lo va a emplear para comprar lenteja, frejol, maní, maíz, entre otros.
 
Sus sueños son tener buena salud y seguir adelante.
texts.en:
In Los Bajos de Montecristi, a town known for its great diversity of typical products, such as the straw hats that are well-known in and outside the country, the communal bank “Mi Banquito” meets every two weeks.

Carmen is a founding member of the communal bank and she likes the help it gives her with the loans. She is 46 years old and married and has three children. One of them is grown and the other two are 16 and 4 years old. One studies in high school. Her husband works in sales.

She is a very good homemaker. To help her husband with the household expenses, she requests the loan so he can finance his business. He sells grains, such as beans, lentils, and peanuts, among other things. He works four days per week in the market in Manta. He has been in this business for 15 years and thanks to God, things have gone well so that he has been able to get ahead.
